lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First and foremost, we are super excited that we actually have in the flesh here with us tonight the wonderful Ashley Johnson! (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So glad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We missed you so much.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I missed you. Everybody.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are not allowed to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're going to put her in a locked room.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'd be okay with it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You'll eat your rice and play Dungeons and Dragons.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so next up I believe, Laura, we have some new merch? Apparently, which I forgot about until you showed me before the show.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's kind of wrinkly because I was sitting on it but...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I have a shirt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So hey, that's in the store. That's in the store right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's got the logo on the back too.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You have a t-shirt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And it's subtle, I like that anybody that doesn't know what it is would just think it's a cool silhouette shirt. And then anybody that does know what it is, it's like they're "in."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is that the kind DM shirt, or is that the evil sarcastic--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's smirking evilly. It's an evil smirk.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You know the meme, when the dungeon master smiles, it's too late.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And it makes me happy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what inspired us to do it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the time he's smiling, you're already getting choked out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Apparently, where it is at now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the second highest rated comic book on Comixology at the moment.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because Critters are awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sitting at nine on the current bestseller list.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of all time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Of all time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On Comixology.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We have the best fans.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, pretty much.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a good book!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Next one is coming soon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We saw it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Excited for you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's got so much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll have information soon on when the next comic comes out next month. Don't forget we have Talks Machina next Tuesday to discuss this episode. Next Tuesday at 7:00pm Pacific with our fantastic host Brian Foster to discuss Travis' third testicle.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, they found out about that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura and Travis, you're going to be at a convention in Atlanta this weekend.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why yes, we leave tomorrow morning actually.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're there Friday, Saturday, Sunday, come down, see us and throw things in our face. That'd be great.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we're also going to be in Australia in a couple weeks, or this November.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley, what's going on with you? Anything to plug? Any other projects that you're working on?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you working on any kind of shows or anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, it seems like you've been so busy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just didn't want to come. I've just got other things to do. Shop online. I'm just busy, guys. Looking at Cute Emergency on Twitter, there's just so many more important things to do than this. Just kidding, that's not true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You do retweet Cute Emergency quite a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're how I found Cute Emergency.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh really? That makes me so glad. We love aminals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: [dramatic music]

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: --me, daddy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Little late on the draw there, bud.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, unfashionably late.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What an accident that was. Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We've left off with the return of Vax, but if there's anything you wanted to do over that period of time before his arrival, now would be the time to do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Before his arrival?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When he walks back.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So that we can do some spells that will be in effect for a day. Potentially.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But he takes a while to come back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes a little while, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we should do some of our spells right before we go to sleep.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, for sure. Is that now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is sleep now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We do need to do Heroes' Feast. I have one chalice left.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: But then Vax won't be in the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Unless we leave him a plate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the meal appears for a short time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Then we need to do that right when he gets back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right before we sleep?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, hopefully he'll be back before--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll wait a few hours.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll wait a few hours to see if he shows up and then we'll cast it to see because we need time to be able to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say for the truncating of the wait period that eight hours go by, 12 hours go by, it's hard to tell time in the Feywild, since it doesn't have a day-night cycle, it's always on the cusp of sunset. And the longer you wait, and the more the boredom sets in, the more the stress of the coming fray creeps into the back of your mind, you find that it seems like far too much time has passed and you begin to worry, you begin to twitch, you begin to do search parties around the surrounding forest, the possibility that he returned and got lost. You don't know how much time has passed until you convene to desperately ask if there was any possible sight, and at that point you hear the snapping of foliage beneath a distant foot, and you all turn and by the nearby tree you see entering the pale, nude, long dark-haired body of Vax returned in his revenant form for a second time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep, that's him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was a thing. Does anyone have my clothing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, they took it and ran, it was part of the penance. We fought bravely. It's buck naked from here on out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's going to make tomorrow a little squirrely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan awkwardly put it in a weird druid circle rock thing, it's over there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We were protecting it for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He doesn't know how to do druid circles really right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The goddess Ioun told me to protect it in a circle reminiscent of the circle of my third eye.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (whispering) I don't think he's telling the truth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you have all my shoes and glasses so I may have them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As Ioun wills it, yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, could you lead me and my penis towards them now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ioun be pleased, I will.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're still standing here. It's getting awkward.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm a holy man. It's supposed to be awkward.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to start the Heroes' Feast, I'm just going to get the chalice.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll help with that, that sounds like a great use of time and not watching this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question. Should we ask the Sword of Kas, since it's fought Vecna before, does it know of any weaknesses?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's actually really smart. Wow, that's really smart, Grog!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh good idea.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't think too hard about it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That took a lot out of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I need to sit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, I have an idea. Why don't you ask the sword if it has any idea of Vecna's weaknesses?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasp) That's a good idea Percy!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so glad I had it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh my god, yes. Wait, wait, if I pull it out of the sheath to talk to it-- can I talk to it through the sheath?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You probably have to draw it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I might have to draw it and then it's going to need the (glugging).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can cut me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Look, listen, I made a promise to your brother, he was very adamant that I'm supposed to stick it--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll take it. It's my turn.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percy, what a tough thing for you to do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want just a hand slice or do you want to up the ante and I stick it in your thigh? I do have to bathe it, it has to be quite a coating.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just do it, we'll heal him up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay, cool, come on Percy. Buy the ticket, baby! So can I unsheathe Kas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you pull the blade out, there's a very silent glass against textured metal sound. The blade is so dark that barely any of the light seems to come across it. Where the blade is, up close, you can barely make out the outside of it, but as soon as you draw it the voice goes, "Hungry."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, just on the count of three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I get to pick where? Okay. I reach around to the back of his knee and I pull along there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Back of his knee?! Are you trying to take him out of commission for future fights? That's really terrible.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I said yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to cast Cure Wounds at third level on Percy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, when you shave your legs the back of your knee is the tricky part, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just so I can swim faster, that was not for you to advertise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you deal with the nearly hamstrung self that is your right knee, the sword is coated well enough in Percival blood as it seeps into the darkened blade, and the voice goes "Ah, yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Respectfully, Kas, I had a few questions because I am on board to satisfy your maniacal desires to fuck up Vecna and all that he stands for, right? Oh no, Kas?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you know of any weaknesses that Vecna has, or opportunities that we could explite?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He is more intelligent than most, but his arrogance gets the best of him. He likes a show."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Apparently he's really smart, and is arro-- aromatic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He smells?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Enigmatic?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Acrobatic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What does he mean?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He likes to put on a show, I think.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He likes to put on a show.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "He builds webs of plots, so many things intertwined."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Doesn't make much sense, apparently he builds whips out of plots.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Cut the threads, and the web can falter."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh right, he strings things together like a web, you know, like a dog makes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh that's smart, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can cut these threads, bring me to these threads, bring me to him, I must cut him down, "now, now."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, oh god, he's really adamant about cutting the webs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's a sword, he cuts, that's his thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, cutting webs?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pro-tip.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. That's interesting, we didn't notice that before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any physical weaknesses, or things that he is vulnerable to that we should know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Him, okay, cool, I think we've got everything.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's vulnerable to-- oh, to--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: To him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Got it, I got what they got.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, next time I pull you out in the light it will probably be to kill Vecna or someone that I don't like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you put it away you hear a (sigh).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're actually going to pull that sword out and it will have committed suicide.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How's your knee, is it okay?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's feeling much better, thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Should we maybe talk out our plan for the moment?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure. That sounds fun.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No it doesn't, but I do think we should probably have at it. We've got the trammels, Grog's got them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So Sylas is back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Along with Delilah. That's fun.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So my blessing, from Pelor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hashtag blessed.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hashtag blessed. Gives radiant damage to anything evil that attacks me with a spell. That's pretty neat, huh? I have a feeling radiant damage is going to be really important in this fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I recently was able to attune to this armor that I haven't been able to attune to for a long time and now I'm resistant to spells. So that's good.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've just been wearing it and it's not done anything?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kind of. Well I had to attune to my ring and my antlers, and then I got the staff, so I let that go, but now I just wore it for long enough.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What are your three attuned right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have four, because I took a feat when I leveled up. Yeah that's pretty dope.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got a whole bunch of more hit points.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's a hit point?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's like, I don't know. But I was thinking, I have all three trammels, right, and I need to get real close to do anything to Vecna. Is it stupid for me to have all of them?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes it is, we need to spread those out. We need to decide who is doing what, at least what we think is going to happen. I think I should take one of the trammels.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're speedy, of course.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And I think it's smart if Pike and I dedicate a decent amount of our spell power to Freedom of Movement right before we go in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That won't be necessary for me but for the rest of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So we don't get paralyzed.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If Vax has a trammel, and Grog has a trammel, who has the third trammel?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One of these two.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I could do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Someone who can fly. You can fly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I have a broom after all. But Pike can fly now too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you have to be super strong to use these trammels?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike is super strong, she's a monstah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm fine with that. Can she fly?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She can fly.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I can now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well it's for ten minutes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all we'll need.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten minutes is a long time if it's right at the beginning of the fight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But that's when we'll need to use the trammels.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Giant wings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's pretty tight. Oh my god you can fucking fly!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach over to Pike, I spin her around, are there any wings on the back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know where they are!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're not there yet.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sometimes they're on the ankles.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I turn her upside down, look at her feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No wings.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I turn her back. Just keep wishing, they'll grow in. Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, thank you, Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So do you think you're stronger, and you're more proficient with actual melee weapons, right? Because I don't think I can shoot a trammel from my bow.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like I'd be pretty proficient because it takes the strength to do it? I've got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So Pike, you're the third. And we have to protect our cleric.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are all of us doing? I'm praying into a book.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fighting.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: To give you a mechanical idea, based on what Ioun had notified you, the more damaged Vecna's avatar form is, the lower the DC to drive a trammel into the body.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, so we got to bloody him up and then--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly. Or roll really high early on, the choice is up to you, that is the risk you have to take.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't know, if we try it with the trammel and it doesn't work, it doesn't break the trammel, we just have to try again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have two strong and one fragile trammel in your midst.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh wait, who's holding the fragile one?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're holding the fragile one.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, so save that one for when he's real fucked up. Percy and I had a thought for Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank god, because I don't have any more.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If you borrow Percy's Spider-Climbing boots I can maybe make some pillars to add for cover for some of us more rangey people, but then if I add pillars of different heights you can climb up them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do I have to attune to them?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does my speed translate to going up things as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know what boots you have right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have the Feral Leaping boots.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Would you rather just run like Spider-Man? Up to you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If he's more than 20 feet in the air, I'm fucked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How can we get Grog to fly, though? Because these pillars can't go all the way to the heavens, can they?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean I could Shapechange into something and give him a mount, he can ride me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about you Scanlan?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you still cast if you're a dragon or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can cast in Beast Shape, Shapechange is a spell, so if I'm a dragon, beholder, that's what you get.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If the creature you transform into has spells you can use those spells, but that's the only circumstance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: There's coffee all over it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes there is, there's coffee on everything there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Your dice tray dried nicely, though.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it actually has a little bit of nice character. Look at that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Critrole!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: This got put in the dishwasher, and the leather got cooler after it got put in the dishwasher.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Anyway you guys.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No no, we're focused. I guess we could use these pillars, but it seems like a waste of your spell to get him halfway up towards Vecna, if Vecna is flying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The thing is if you're flying you can get knocked off, I've been there, and then it's super bad, so actually the pillars are really wonderful in that regard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If he's straight above us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well I can do six of them, I can do a lot of pillars.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He could be off of the tower, yes, and then it's all ranged attacks, that's what we have.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, no plan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The plans are easy, the magic users are going to be attacking Vecna with all they're worth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hopefully we'll be able to take out the Briarwoods before the fight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can cause up to six pillars, each pillar is a cylinder five feet wide and up to 30 feet high, and can do six of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you do them on top of each other?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, he wasn't that much more than 30 feet last time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He was above us, but if he goes off of the tower.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was about 50 or 60 feet in the air and I was above him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I get Grog 30 feet up you still have your throwing axe, he's still reachable another 30 feet for you right? Theoretically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but I'm not using the axe or the hammer, I'm using the sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can still attach the Chain of Returning to the Sword of Kas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, but it's only one attack per action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Instead of three.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it's something, if he's out of range.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll have enough bullets that I may not be able to hurt him, but I can make him drop.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you planning on doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My plan is to not run away, because we're going to die fighting or we're going to save the world, right? So I definitely won't be running away. Definitely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I may run away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If you do, and he slaughters everybody, and subjugates the entire world--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll tell your story, and I'll tell it very well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As the Crumbly, the little guy to Jabba the Hutt, for Vecna.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan. If you promise you won't run away, I'll put this fucking hat back on.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I bring out the stupid pointy hat that he gave me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow! That's a deal.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Here's the thing, last time we fought Vecna, he went higher than 30 feet, he was up where Vax was before he fell.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was above him though, and I was 50 or 60 up, he wasn't that high.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One of them, yes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I feel like I don't want to go to sleep.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (whispers) I know. We need to, though.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, it's weird to say goodnight, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not going down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. He doesn't know what's going to hit him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Exactly.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're the S.H.I.T.s.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Fuck him.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We've got other gods on our side. He's a fucking half-ass god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. And you-- You're not going anywhere.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right. Good night?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good night.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: In the morning.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, Percy, get your rest, because your last words to me tomorrow need to be indignant and irritated.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've already planned them out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Goodnight, brother.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Goodnight, brother.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And we sleep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (singing) Oh, my darling, I hunger for your touch--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And knowing that you've taken your faith from a place of being forgotten to a newly built symbol of hope. These thoughts all mingle, as the dark of rest takes you. And as you all awake, in the center of this strange, mystical meadow, peeking through the hints of purple and orange that signify the sky that breaks through the canopy of this forest, the pools of Nala that once brought you here long ago. You all awake, the beds gone, the tents gone. You're all lying amongst this field in a circle, around each other. As you come to consciousness, you all sit up, take a breath, feel the warmth and the knowledge of what has to be done wash over you, the shadow between two distant trees reveals the orange mane of Artagan once more, as he steps forth, his high green collar disappearing into his long sleeves, and a cloak that billows past his shoulders and loops into his back, as he almost glides effortlessly through the grass. "I take it you all "slept well?"

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, then. Time is of the essence. You've been here more than a day."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just barely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just know. But whenever you're ready. I'll see what I can whip up." As he wipes his fingers against each other, you can see the sparkle, spiral of purples and blues and oranges and colors, causing this glow under his face and his hair as he gets excited at the prospect of seeing just how far he can tweak the boundaries of the Feywild that he calls home.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Here we go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What are you holding over there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Myself. My other hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Trinket's back in the necklace for the bamfing over.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the Material Plane.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you glance around you, you can see you stand in the rubble, the exterior of a building that has fallen long ago. You see large chunks of the secondary floor fallen inward and dust (poof) around you as your knees hit. You look up and can see the familiar green-blue crackle of the barrier above you. You've managed to make it on the interior of Thar Amphala. You look up to see, immediately, clusters of gloomstalkers in the distance. They haven't quite gotten a view on you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In the building, now!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all dart. Make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First roll, first roll, first roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good luck!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's one way to do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, natural 19.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan One, 19. Scanlan Two, 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. This building is mostly collapsed; there's a small alcove in the corner where part of the secondary story is still there. You guys dart into the side of it and you rest there for a minute in quiet. (nervous breathing) And you suddenly hear an impact of stone against the wall behind you. All of you guys immediately turn around and you watch as the heavy piece of stone that marks the outer part of this building is now cracked, and part of it begins to fall in. I need Scanlan One, real Scanlan, and Percy to make dexterity saving throws, please.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not good. Ten.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to burn a resolve.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Burning it already?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled really low. I want to do that a little better.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So take a conk on the head!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, you don't know! You don't know!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know-- which is why I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do? Are you going take it or not?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm going to kill a resolve, one more. That's way better! Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, cool. You only take three points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan takes six.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's just a resolve; I got three.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Six points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You reduced three points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought they could be trapped under the wall or something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, it was fair. I'm not in the mood for that. And resolves I got plenty of.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As it rights its head, you see a leaping blur of black armor and red scales climb to the back of the beast, grasping the side of its shoulders as it spins back and forth, trying to shake it. You see this humanoid figure, trying to take something and throw it around its throat and its head, however, it's just not able to grasp it around, and gets thrown off the side and to the back. You watch as the gloomstalker bucks off the assailant and begins to try and get its wings up once more, as the figure leaps up again and shoulder slams it into the wall a second time. You get a better look at it now. You can see now, standing at a pretty decent height, about a seven-foot dragonborn of red scale and black, hooked armor, bladed and angry. You see a burning fury in its eyes. Joe, if you want to come to the table, please.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh! (cheering)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Welcome to the table!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What's this? (cheering and laughing)

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Brothers in arms! Yeah!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I like that it's kitty-corner right now.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: The tanks on the ends.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Arkhan. You've been trying to wrestle this gloomstalker down-- You spent days here, trying to find a way to recover from the circumstances that left you here. This is the closest thing you've had at this circumstance, as you've regained your strength, and as you leap onto its back, it continues to knock you off to the side. You guys see this confrontation happening. What do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like-- (pained noise)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I'll run in.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, he's attacking a gloomstalker; I'll join in.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so what are you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to help this guy out and throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and make two attacks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Plus one to--

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Wait, don't hurt him! Don't hurt him; I scream: Don't hurt him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, he's thrown two daggers.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I did, and they both hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes. Technically adjacent, so you do sneak attack damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, I will.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh boy.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Four-- It could be bad. 12--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, wow. What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: All of the damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Save it for battle!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 34, 35-- I can't! It's too late; it's triggered!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Don't do it!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 46 for the first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cover tiny Scanlan's eyes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Welcome to the game, Joe!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is what we do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, what were you

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I hope you have a healing potion.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see two daggers into the side of the gloomstalker. It gives this horrible shrieking shout in pain and rears up.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Now that it's distracted, does that give me some sort of advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I will say, given the pain it's had, make an athletics check because you are attempting to grapple the entity.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That's correct. All right, okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see, does it look like he's got hands and eyes complete?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That's athletics, that's going to be a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Is it part dragon?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. It is not. It's considered a monstrosity.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Okay, fair enough. Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay. You hear the dragonborn shout out, seeing the dagger slam into its side. What do you yell to them as they're attacking it?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Don't hurt this thing. Help me wrestle it to the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At which point, it now thrusts the dragonborn off of its back. He goes tumbling and rolling onto the ground, landing onto your back, and you see it--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I throw out the Rope of Entanglement. On the gloomstalker.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I turn to Percy, and I go: Who's fighting who?!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So now I would like an initiative roll from everybody, please.

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What's that? Plus a d10 to my initiative now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Does Scanlan Two take my initiative, or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Separately.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're two people again! How does it feel?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The best.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 to 20, anybody?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Natural 20, which made a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Grog-- All right. Super low. All right, 20 to 15?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry, Scanlan Two is also 21.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Joe, you're sitting on Scanlan Two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. 15 to ten?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 12. No, really?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, would I be Pike without rolling shit initiative?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax, what'd you get?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eight, wow. What'd you get, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes. A six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so. Vex, you're up first. You're going to use the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Rope of Entanglement, is what I was going for. I can't find my--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It has to make a DC 15 dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Natural 20 to natural one. Back to back. As you fall onto your back and shout that out, you go rushing towards it and you watch as this glowing, long piece of thick rope begins to suddenly wrap around this gloomstalker as it's trying to take off again. It gets, like, a foot off the ground before its wings get pulled up to its body, and it falls back onto the ground, wrapped and restrained by the rope.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Great. I can do my thing now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is anybody else going to do anything, right now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I run up. I'm going to run up, and grab it by the head and neck and lay on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Scanlans?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm just watching. And I turn to Scanlan Two and say: So that's a gloomstalker.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And that guy, I'm not sure what he is, but he looks really cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, Arkhan.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I remove this golden-needled, five-jeweled wreath from around my neck, and I approach the beast, and I fasten it around its neck.

lines.name: SAM, TRAVIS
lines.text: Shock collar.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of. So it's a DC 17.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If it barks, it activates.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Five plus six, that's an eleven. It does not succeed. You watch as the thrashing around gloomstalker on the ground begins to slowly calm down until it reaches a point where it's not moving; it's breathing, and you almost hear what sounds like a reverse purr.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Does this thing have horns?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Where the jaw is, its tongue lashes out, but instead of saliva, it gives off smoke.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Then I grab it by the back of the jaw, here, and I put my forehead down to its forehead, and I close my eyes, and then open them, and they turn into that thing's eyes, correct?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Mm-hmm.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the gloomstalkers, they have no discernible pupil; it's a glowing beacon of yellow-white where each eye is. And you watch as this dragonborn opens its eyes, it's headbutted against it, and the dragonborn's eyes now match the coloration of the gloomstalker.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I climb up onto its back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It's still bound by the rope. But you get up onto it now. You watch as this massive dragonborn gets up onto the gloomstalker, which is now currently on the ground, trying to right itself now, still wrapped in the rope.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: You can release the rope now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like anybody's noticed us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We've been fighting silently.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do look and see two more gloomstalkers that have broken away from the cluster, that are making their way in your direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Will this thing obey you? We should get inside. I let go of the rope and go back in the building so that we can hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Everyone else following?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I cast Pass Without a Trace on all of us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everyone else following suit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Yeah. Absolutely.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Do you leave the gloomstalker where it is and then step inside with them?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Can I take it with me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I'd like to take it with me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heavy footsteps) This is the second time you've had an allied gloomstalker this close, and it's a very upsetting proximity.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Uncomfortable elevator at a convention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kind of. As you guys pull into the side, I'd like you all to make a stealth check, please.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why did you wear wings?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Stealth check!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: If I'm on its back, does that have anything to do with my plate armor? Meaning, am I relying on some form of stalking that doesn't make my armor clank around?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Unfortunately, as you're still riding it and it moves and shifts, there is still the plate sitting against it, so you would still be at a disadvantage.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Am I the only one in plate armor here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, she's got plate armor.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Nope. Clanky twins!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I just didn't want to be fully responsible.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She has something that makes her less clanky-like.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, you got your boots.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Boots!?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, so you don't roll at disadvantage anymore.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, wait.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. You got non-clanky boots.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: And I am at disadvantage? (sighs)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Add ten to your roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you're fine.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Okay. 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw, yeah!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Disadvantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: By the way, there's your stat sheet for the gloomstalker.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's taken 50 damage, so you can note that.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Can I feed it a healing potion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you have a moment you can, yeah.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: What could go wrong?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were jumping at him, and punching him in the face. I thought wrong. I do that sometimes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you have a name for him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you have a name? That's true. I just love animals.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We can kill you any second, so be scared of us, if you're an evil person.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: You could. But I know these two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And there's a moment of recognition for Percival and Keyleth.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, holy shit.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No way.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh. It's been, like-- two years?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At least two years.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: At least. Percival, you've aged. Keyleth, you still look the same.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (giggles)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She got a haircut.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit. Are you going to let him do that to your girl?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's at this moment you hear two heavy impacts from nearby rooftops.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay. Maybe not the best reunion time.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few rocks tumble around you as you're quietly in that space, hoping. (thudding and croaking) Its head peeks over the edge and looks straight down, right into all of you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, God darn it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I shoot an arrow into its eyeball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So as soon as the head passes over, make your attacks. You're close enough to get one swipe up, because you're on the back of a gloomstalker. So as its head peeks down, you can get a strike at it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How high up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's about, I'd say, 12 to 15 feet up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That's going to be a 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Damn, that's a Vox Machina number. About damn time. That's what level 17 will get you. All right. Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty. So.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 20, 21, and a miss.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So those both hit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 25 damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25 damage, all righty.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, and I get to do it again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is his proximity close enough that either of these guys are within five feet, or anybody's within--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. Oh, I'd say Arkhan probably is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18 damage?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18, does that hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That does hit, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come on, insta-kill this thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know. I don't want to have to do anything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: This is the paladin dilemma. I think I'm going to save the spell slots. But I am going to swing at this guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to swing my battleaxe, Fane-Eater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you get two attacks with that.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Great. Oh, okay. Well, one was 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Oh, that's going to be nine, plus 14. That's 23 points of damage on the first one. And then second attack is going to be a 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: And that's going to be 21 points of damage on the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. And with that, as soon as its head peeks over the edge, two arrows (whooshing) under its throat, and you watch as an axe cuts part of its head clean off, as it tries to make a noise, but the blade is caught in its throat and prevents the air passage. As Fane-Eater is yanked out of the side, you see the jagged edge of the axe arc back, causing blood to splatter across the back, the wall behind him, as Arkhan goes in with a second swipe. And with one clean cleave motion, the head falls and plummets into the ground. The rest of the gloomstalker tumbles in, lifeless, into the rock. And you see as it lands, its wings sprawl out and slowly the body begins to dissolve into black smoke and shadow.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I run out and I say: Wait! Don't kill it! I'm just kidding. It's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Vox Machina, may we introduce you to Arkhan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Arkhan?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Arkhan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You look like you've, you know-- You look like us. You got more stuff. We've acquired more stuff, over the years. That's cool.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How do you know this gentleman?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We did some work, ages ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, forever. Before we really knew any of you.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: The temple of Shumash.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did you get here?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically it was a desert, but yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was a crappy desert. Good times.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it was the worst kind of swamp. It was one with no water.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It was, yes. The driest of swamps, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are you doing here?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That's a long story. Weeks ago, we wound up attacked by a cult, my companions and I. This cult was led by a Death Knight. And a sorcerous woman.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lady Briarwood.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sylas?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: And then Vecna followed. And we were ambushed. My companions and I were marked for death. They were all destroyed. And I watched that Death Knight burn the closest thing I've ever had to a brother. And he cut the still-beating heart out of our goliath. And then these buzzards came to pick my bones, thinking I was dead. But I wouldn't die. The queen had another plan for me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The queen? What kind of queen?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I hold up my shield.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a religion check, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hm, that's no good. 11?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have passing knowledge that the symbols that adorn both around Arkhan's throat and the shield that he holds up are that of the Scaled Tyrant, Tiamat, which is the patron god to chromatic and evil dragons all across the world.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, he's evil. That's evil. That's the evil dragon. Potentially.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You serve this queen?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's our kind of evil. It's fine.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I understand that because of my dogma, we belong to groups that would never mix, but I can assure you, if you help me get revenge on the one that killed my friends, I swear to you, I will fight for your lives with the fury of a man who is already dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think we have a surprising amount already in common.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Good pitch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Devil's advocate: maybe not. I don't know, maybe--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I'm just going to do an insight check on principle.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I make the gloomstalker snarl at the two Scanlans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (snarls)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I rolled an eight. He checks out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Quick question. We didn't roll our temporary hit points for our Heroes' Feast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you did not. You should do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we do that? Or does Pike do that for us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, Pike, you roll the temporary hit points.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For all of us, right? It's an additional 2d10, I'm pretty sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll 2d10, Pike. And everyone who was present for that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah, you should give us a speech. How long does that last?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I totally should've given a speech.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's a ten-minute one, yeah?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, it's a short rest thing. But it's a thing that lasts until--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Later, then.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. I should've done that before, but I'll do it next time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whatcha doing over there, Johnson?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm just looking for my tens!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two ones.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Two ones?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, are these 12s?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, those are tens.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you guys gain two additional hit points, to your max hit points.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is such a bummer.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Is that everybody?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. You weren't there for the meal, unfortunately. It's from earlier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's okay; the meal didn't do a lot, apparently.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So glad I'm here to be useful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, everyone does still have their advantage on wisdom saving throws and you're immune to fear. Which is pretty huge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And poison.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And poison. The hit points are more of, like, a bonus. You're fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was slim fast. Slim feast.

lines.name: MATT, MARISHA
lines.text: Slim feast!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Can I feed this thing a healing potion?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You may.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I really thought I was going to roll two tens.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Greater? I think greater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you have, yeah--

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I have a greater.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So that would be 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I rolled the wrong, I actually rolled the wrong tens.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That's nine; that's not great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, that's not great. We'll figure it out later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We know Lay on Hands and some such.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Well, I have them, I just don't want to blow them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wait. You can't die?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that true? Wait, when did he say he couldn't die?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, he said, like, "She thought I was dead, but my queen--"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He said he would fight like a man who is dead, but he wasn't--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was a metaphor, Grog. It was a metaphor.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no, you're right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you mean actually; have you died?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: It's kind of a colloquialism for religious folk. You know what I mean? Like, I hit a death save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, tight, tight, tight, tight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I touch him to see if he's real.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I blow smoke out of my nostrils, like a little fire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kind of squishy. Really soft.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank god he's wearing that armor, huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Pudgy.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I'm going to pump 30, then, back into this gloomstalker. Plus the nine. So there was, what, 51 that came off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 50 points of damage were taken off.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: 50 points, so I put 39 back on, so that's 11 off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep, you got it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When do we want to do Freedom of Movement stuff? Not yet?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's short term.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Here's the thing. Do we go for the outer walls to take out the shield first? Probably. Once we go in, we're going in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The outer walls of the city?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of Thar Amphala, yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How are we going to take down entire walls without being--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have to take out the walls. We have to break a couple of the crystals.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, those crystals that we started to break when we were in the Shadowfell.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If just do a hit and run, we can cause so much chaos that all of these gloomstalkers are going to be busy dealing with everything in the air.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! You remember our old plan of just set everything on fire? Let's set everything on fire!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah! In fact, that's actually a brilliant plan. We could disable a crystal, maybe I could light a signal, distract people. While they're distracted, we make it to the next one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And as long as we're close to that one, they don't know that we're here. They can't see us.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: What are these crystals?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We don't know where these crystals are!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're all around the outer wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We saw them when we were in the city before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, in the Shadowfell. Remember, we jabbed at one, and decided against it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If we break these crystals, this could help--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everything.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Does anyone know that you're here?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Vecna. The female wizardess.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She knows?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: And the Death Knight.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And if they've been watching, he just vanished. We should run now.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: But they thought I was dead. They left me for dead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So they don't necessarily know you're in the city.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I think they'd be surprised to see me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. All right, cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, stealthily, let's try to make it to the outer wall so that we can cut out some of these crystals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. First off, make a perception check as you glance out to see how close you are to the nearby wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you're maybe about 200 feet from the nearest wall. You can see the curvature of the dome is pretty striking from your current position. And you can see the pulses, the waves. Imagine like a reverse waterfall of energy shooting upward. And every now and then, there's a burst.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it look like there's an area that the pulses are brighter, along the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are certain locations, about six of them throughout the city, that you occasionally see them (bursting), and they spread out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are we close to one of those pulses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can maneuver there. It's not directly behind you, but you can eventually get to that location, yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay. I see where one of the crystals is; let's move towards that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll get Grog to smash it to smithereens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I smash (stumbling) mitheens.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You do. To mitheens.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (drawn out) Mitheens.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're so good at punching walls.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. I would like you all to make a stealth check. Are you all walking on foot? Are you taking the gloomstalker?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I'm on top of the gloomstalker.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it walking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: It's walking right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's currently walking, unless you want to hover with it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You got to stay within 60 feet of us? 30 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 60 feet.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I'd like to hover.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys are staying lowkey, Arkhan is currently riding against the back of this gloomstalker as it's hovering in the air above. And the stealth check you're going to be rolling is going to be to see whether or not anything notices you on the back of a gloomstalker. The gloomstalker is not going to register on the radar of any of the current watching creatures, because it's part of its posse for the moment.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: So is this with disadvantage for plate armor, or not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I would say no, because it isn't a movement-based stealth check; you're just trying to stay still.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: With the bonus.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus ten.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Love it. Good. 31.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Shit, all right. You're just clutching the exterior of it, trying to stay low. You're pulling into your armor like a turtle shell, since it is black. And using that to try and blend into its form

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And can we kind of stay under the shadow of the gloomstalker?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys can move along.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, 29 and 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keyleth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vax?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I rolled a four, so it's 37.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fucking rogue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No, I did it wrong.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: His head has muscles.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. A five and a six. All right, so. As you guys begin to maneuver through the streets, dodging from building to building, on the outskirts of Thar Amphala, thankfully, the streets are a little more sparse on the edges. You also notice as you're traversing, and this is interesting.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: It's his head shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would have liked if he had signed it.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: It's Arkhan's commercial head shot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, yeah. You need to print one in black and white.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (deep voice) If I'm good at reproductions.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: This is, like, work in the office look.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (laughing) That's such an L.A. joke, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're now being driven by some intent. Whereas once they were just scattered amongst, and in a holding pattern, now they're maneuvering with solid purpose, away from the sides of the wall, and the shields, which enables you to go relatively unnoticed. But you're seeing them now, gathering towards similar tunnels to the one you came up in. You can see dozens and dozens of zombies and skeletons, and the occasional robed cultist, both warrior and mage alike, all beginning to make their way down into the titan, at various points in the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Making their way

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're going to go attack the city.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We got to get these shields down so that Vasselheim can actually have--

lines.name: MARISHA, LIAM
lines.text: A fighting chance.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's find the crystals.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: All right, let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Rolling shitty-ass perception.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's okay, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's okay for you guys.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let it happen.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Eventually, you come around one cluster of exterior buildings. It looks to be what was once a manor, that was converted to a fortress. Like a small exterior fortress to this inner circle of Thar Amphala. You curve around and there you see, familiar to you from once before, the walls that surround the exterior of this inner sanctum of Thar Amphala, and the basis of this field that contains the entirety of the city. Looking at the wall, you can already feel the dangerous vibration of this field being so close. There's this violent hum to the air, that with each pulse hits this certain frequency of sound that causes your ear to tweak just a hint. And you can see violent waves of green-blue magical energy, (pulsing) up the side of the wall, like a very powerful reverse waterfall. Shooting up, to gather and maintain this field. You cannot see the crest. The crest was visible from the outside of the wall. And the energy field is being produced on the outside of the wall. You're on the inside of it. But you can gather the base location of where this burst is happening to get an idea of loosely where it might be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How thick is the wall?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And we saw the crest before because there was a doorway in the outer wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there any kind of doorway around us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over to where the door was, below the crest, before, and you can see the opposite side of a door, currently, yes. It is shut. And appears to be made of hard wood with-- It's iron bar reinforced crosshatch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, we can try the door, and then if that doesn't work, Grog can make a new one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let me check out the door.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. I'm just, me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to check and see if the door is trapped.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you with doors?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Pretty good.

lines.name: TRAVIS, JOE
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: TRAVIS, TALIESIN
lines.text: Sh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thankfully only rolled a nine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 26 for investigation on the door.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The door is locked, but it is not trapped.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. Let's open it up.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Hungry?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, fuck yeah. Don't share it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It swings open and slams on the inside of the frame, and there you're looking at a wall of violent green arcane energy. (whoosh) Coasting by-- Actually, this is blasting downward right now, because the threshold crest, as you recall, was above the doorway, in the wall.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we see it? Like above the doorway?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's flush.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's like on the other side?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And currently where the door opens, there is violent magical energy slamming down.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you think it's possible to, like, punch up on the archway and knock the crystal down?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I pick up a rock about that big, walk ten feet back, and throw it at the energy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It hits the field, and there's a violent flash in that section, about a foot radius around where it was, and the rock shoots past you. Make a dexterity saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ooh, that's not good. 16.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16? Strange. Wow! That's the first time you've failed a dex save in a long time!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I rolled a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, thank god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So happy about it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You are fallible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a d4 plus two. But it literally pelts you in the side of jaw and the neck, and you turn around and feel it. And you can feel the pulsing of the blood begin to flow into the bruise that's going to be there tomorrow.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I literally just got choked to death 18 hours ago, so I'm not sweating it. What're we going to do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog? Let's start drilling up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Try punching up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, but if we interfere with that forcefield and it somehow hits us, we're going to be hurting.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, yeah. Not only should we back up a little bit, except for me, we should also have an area that we're going to run to, right? Because I'm sure this will bring the noise.

lines.name: MARISHA, LAURA
lines.text: Is there a house nearby?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's two story and a decent size. But it looks like it's been reinforced in the walls, like somebody had designed for it to be a place to hold off some sort of a stand, probably from the war with Pelor's army, long ago. That's the closest thing to this doorway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: However, we're staying within 60 feet of you while you're punching.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Arkhan's going to stay, just in case it needs, like, a double--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A double punch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. You know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's probably more than 20 feet, actually; it's probably like 30, 40 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 30 feet away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: How many gloomstalker riders are in the sky above?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, overall? Make a perception check.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Okay. Yikes. Eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a lot of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sky's clear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Like, there's a lot of them by Entropis.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Gloomstalker shit hits me in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. But you do notice that there's-- where previously there wasn't, there's a cloud gathering at the top of this dome funneling down onto Entropis.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually. Well, hold on. You got to stay here, right? Because of the--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's what I said; I'm staying within 60 feet of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would like to rage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: And I go: Tiger Uppercut! and I just punch the roof of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Destroy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, destroy. 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits. Go ahead and roll damage, d4 plus your strength modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is 15. Just by itself. So.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Times two. That's 30 points of damage with a punch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: One Punch Man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But it's sustained some very serious damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One more and we run. And take cover.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One more?

lines.name: LAURA, ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I also need you to go ahead and make a constitution saving throw, please.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to walk up behind him--

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: He's within ten feet of me. He gets a plus four.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And plus two from me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome. Well, they don't stack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doesn't stack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The plus four is what you get.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Then I'm backing the fuck up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From the aura.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Aura of Protection. Provided by Tiamat!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you slam into it, there's a burst of arcane energy out of that section of the doorway and wall that slams into you. You go spinning past, spiraling, and you catch yourself on the ground about 20 feet away, in the middle of the open there. Catch yourself.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Feet skidding, like a Jackie Chan film.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Still don't fucking see you, okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a very loud--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm rolling so shitty today.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, well. You're going to roll well when it counts.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I'll take a shot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take a shot as well?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So as Grog spins back and catches himself, you walk up to this doorframe. With your axe in hand?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. Roll an attack.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Okay, that's going to be a 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 19 hits a wall!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's an AC of 18 on the wall.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The wall has an AC of 18?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The wall has my armor class. That's really horrifying.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: With my axe--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's solid!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a magic wall.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That's going to be 20 points of damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20 points of damage, that'll do it. So as Grog catches up, and look up, you watch as Arkhan rushes forward, and with a giant leap, cleaves the axe into the stone. As it does, the archway collapses downward. First off, make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm standing there like a catcher, ready.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Con save? All right. Not big money. This is not. It's going to be more whammy than big money. That's a nine on a con save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's actually a dig in the ground, like a groove where the impact is. At that point, as you watch the wall crumble and collapse, you see, suddenly dislodged from its position, the about two and half foot wide threshold crest stone that is embedded in the wall there crumples downward and falls out of its space. As it does, there's a series of bursts of vibrant arcane energy that shoot up the wall, causing this side of the wall to glow exponentially brighter than the rest of the shield. At which point, like a large slice of pie, one sixth of the dome falls inward, and for the first time since you've arrived, you see the non-filtered sky above of the darkened clouds that have completely encased the upper atmosphere of Othanzia. You also glance past where it crumbled, as the city is at a slight angle forward, the way it's placed on the front of the titan, and you look down and see, immediately around, the familiar sight of the Vasper Timberlands that surround the exterior of Vasselheim. And there ahead, not more than maybe a few miles off, you can assume from this distance, you see the singular mountain pillar that Vasselheim is built around, and the outer wall in sight.
