lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to throw Whisper at her, and she's down, so I have advantage. That is a 27 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 27 to hit hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm going to bamf there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's prone, so yeah. You have disadvantage on the attack against her.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What, because she's prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a ranged attack. You don't have advantage against her because there's nothing giving you advantage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Her being prone doesn't give me advantage?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, her being prone, against ranged attacks, it's with disadvantage. Roll a second time.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That's much worse.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But it cancels out.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because of Sharpshooter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sharpshooter means he ignores cover. Doesn't give him advantage on the attack roll.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hold on, what was that one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's on her back and sees the dagger and goes (ping) and deflects it off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, second attack is a natural 20.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Really?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. With Whisper, she has to make a saving throw with a DC of 18 or become frightened of me for a minute, on a crit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What was the DC on that one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18? She has a plus ten wisdom save, so that's going to put her at a 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right. (counting)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a great way to roll.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's a crit. Double the dice.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but it's not sneak attack, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, sorry, so. 32. Thank you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No worries.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Wow, your reverse math was super fast just then. That would have taken me five minutes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And I'm going to bamf there on it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't worry. And with my bonus action, I'm going to throw my third dagger up at the wall. Can I throw Whisper again? Is it like quick draw, or does it have to change daggers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, I'd consider it to change dagger, generally, because you're throwing them so fast.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, then instead I'm going to disengage, and I'm going to dart back between the Scanlans.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Between the Scanlans.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, that ends your turn, Vax?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At the end of your turn, Sylas is going to use his second legendary action.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, she used a reaction to knock the dagger away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sylas.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: She used Shield, which is a reaction, so she can't hit me with an attack of opportunity. Never mind.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's not what this is. Sylas is using a legendary action. This has nothing to do with Delilah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're talking about your disengage. Don't worry about it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sylas is going to use his second legendary action at the end of your turn to take a swing at Grog with his Greataxe of the Eclipse.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Greataxe of the Eclipse?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, Delilah or Sylas?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sylas.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 21.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is 14 points of damage, reduced to seven, and I need you to make a wisdom saving throw, please.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With advantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: First one was a three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends that. Next up is Keyleth and Scanlan Two.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Scanlan Two. Are you just as charismatic as Scanlan One?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've got all the words to make the girls like me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I don't care. Okay, Keyleth is going to try to do a one-two punch here. She's going to move forward and then does she see Delilah?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check. I'd say probably, actually. You watched her get knocked back; you're fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to reach out and do an Entangle spell right under her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Unless she can make a strength save versus my spell shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a four plus one. No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fail, so she is restrained, and then I'm going to run, and I'm going to use my Mantle of the Tempest to jump, and then trying to be dope, here, in mid-air, I'm going to change into an earth elemental and try and grab onto the bone dragon and see if I can snap his neck in the process. Grapple the bone dragon's head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Entangle is an action?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, and then I'm running and jumping and grabbing for the rest of my movement.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Do we need some more tape?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, I can finally use the layer over here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you want me to get the tape?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, you leap over. That's the rest of your turn. After entangling her, you run, leap, and as the wind from the mantle picks up, you watch this gust of wind lift her. Make an athletics check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: To try to land on the dragon?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A straight athletics? Yeah. (whimpers) 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Not too bad. That's enough. It was maybe a 15-foot jump at this point, and it's tripled because of your mantle, so you leap and land, transforming into the elemental and grappling onto its back. All right. That ends your turn, Keyleth. Scanlan Two?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's grappled now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She is, yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah. Fuck her shit up!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She's prone and grappled.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Prone and grappled, and not for a very long time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So if we hit her, it automatically hits, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Physically. You get advantage on attacks against her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Bigby's Hand a magic attack or a physical attack? It's a melee spell attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a melee spell, so you get advantage on the attack roll, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, then I'll change my plans and I'll do that. Scanlan Two will cast Bigby's Hand at level-6 and pound her really hard. Shit.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Is that a Philip Seymour Hoffman Happiness reference? (laughter)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is that 6d8? Or 8d8? Bigby's Hand; I always forget.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's 5th-level, and you've cast it at 6th, correct? So it's an additional 2d8 to the punch.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And it starts at 4d8? Oh, so it's only 6d8.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Would you like to borrow some d8s?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. You know what? I'm going to do it at level-7, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You already said 6th.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. That's fine. All right, so a bunch of d8s.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to roll to hit first, so d20 with advantage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 17 plus 11.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits, so roll your 6d8.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. One, two, three, four, five.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Or you can use the Smite dice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I like these. 29.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 29, and then I guess, as his bonus action, he'll inspire Vax, who's not even here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sing to the space where he was.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He only knows the songs that he already knows!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I told you, it's the jam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so when he gets back, give him the d12.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And then he moves. He ducks back behind there. Yeah, just peeking out a little so he can see where Bigby's Hand is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. At the end of your turn, Sylas is going to use his last legendary action to move his speed without provoking opportunity attacks. He leaps off the side and lands right next to Delilah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he get entangled? Because he did just land in difficult terrain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not entangled, I don't think, because he wasn't there for the casting. Difficult terrain means he moves across at half.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's in difficult terrain.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Good to know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have rocky ground. That's all I have.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, so entangled... okay, yeah. Got it. Cool. That ends the legendary action. Grog, you're up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I jump to the top of the bannister here so I'm looking down at old tangled-up Delilah. (sighs) May I leap off the tower and straight onto Delilah's prone body?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. Make an athletics check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So romantic.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Feet stomping her chest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's easy enough. Make an athletics check, actually, in case something goes horribly bad. You are raging, so you get advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Easy enough. At that height, you take eight points of bludgeoning damage, reduced to four, and (impact) you land, arcing over her, both feet to each side of her, and you're standing, looming over her body as she's wrapped up in vines, going (grunting).

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I fucking hate this dead bitch. And I raise the sword and start swinging down in these huge arcs at her. The first two attacks at her.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you pull the blade up, the voice goes, "Yes. Her. She's part of the web. Her. Her!" And you give into the fury. Go ahead and make your attacks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are they with advantage because she's prone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Well, she's restrained.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's going to die.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Butcher that motherfucker!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Should I roll the second attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll the damage first. She's hurt, but she's not terrible. Yet.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: She's about to be terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (counting) 21 plus 14. Help me. 35?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 21 plus 14? Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 35, okay. So that's those. Let me make sure I'm doing this right. Oh, that's before the modifier.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 35 times two now?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just 35.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Modifier goes on at the end.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What do you get for the crit on Kas? What do you get for the crit? That's why I'm asking if you double your dice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, I mean my brutal critical. I roll the damage die, an additional--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You roll the damage die, double that, add the modifiers, and then the additional damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you're raging right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two times, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus your rage damage, don't forget to double that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two damage dies at this level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll see--

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: This is that crazy new sword.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three, at 17th level.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Three?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so 3d10 additional.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, so 51 plus 3d10.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And is that doubled too?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be crazy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 62. I rolled pretty low.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you bring the blade down, with this horrible screaming hiss--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's one hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, 62 points of damage. The blade jams into her chest, and as you twist it she screams, and the blood from the wounds sprays out in the middle of the air, freezes, and then slips into the blade as it's sucking up the blood. She's like (grunts) entangled, and she reaches up and grabs the blade, and begins to start pulling it out of the wound, she's (choking) as blood begins splattering up around her mouth, but she's still alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you want it out? Here, let me help you out (yells) and put it back in!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That is a 32.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it when the music stops, we're like (hyperventilates).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. You jam the blade in a second time, and gash across and it carves open this part of her chest, and you can see the blood spatter out. The bones are exposed, and she's on the ground, shaking. She's hanging on by a tether, and her eyes are going wild, and she glances over, and her hand goes out. And you can see Sylas, who's right next to her, his eyes are wide and he's reaching out to grasp for her hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gravelly) Chop her hand off!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is that the end of your turn? Oh, you're frenzied raging? Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh no. Yeah!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, come on Grog!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was going to do something to Sylas but fuck it, we're going to hit her.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispered) Chop off her hand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Chop off her whole arm.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 33 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits, roll damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (singing) Please die Deliah, we want you dead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Third time's the charm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23 points of damage? Are you rolling extra undead damage on this? On these attacks? Because she's not undead.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope, nope. 23 plus-- I wasn't even adding-- I was so excited about the sword damage I was forgetting my rage damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, but you rolled 3d10 there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did, yeah. The d10 plus 2d10 slashing damage to undead right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's not undead though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, she's not?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've been adding that to all the attacks? Okay, noted. Roll--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I figured she was dead, then not dead--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll 4d10 for me right now. I'm going to retract that from the damage she's taken.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's still wounded, but she's not hanging on by that thread. Okay, so the damage you rolled for that attack?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: 24. But I hadn't added my--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So do your damage again because that--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll the d10 and add your modifiers.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Okay fair enough. Shit, I'm so sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He wasn't doing his rage modifiers, so you could add that then, potentially?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The difference.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: So that's 21.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: With your rage?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's the end of your turn. She's still alive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vex, you're up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good job.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I thought she was undead, just figured.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she's alive.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: She's a clone.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, I was wondering about that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sylas is undead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: The dragon's undead.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: No, because I've faced her before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are the gloomstalkers undead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not undead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bet she's a fucking clone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What does that mean?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She made a clone of herself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That ends your turn. Vex.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so if I attack her, it's at disadvantage? Or with--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a ranged attack? Yes, because she is-- well, she's restrained, which gives her advantage, so technically, it would be just a regular attack roll.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well then I'm going to attack her. She's already restrained. Fuck it, I'm going to attack her with a blazing bowstring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Kill her, kill her.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes. 17 plus 14, with sharpshooter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, that hits.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Minus five. Oh god, 15 plus two is 17, 25, 30, plus the blazing bowstring, 37. That's everything, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did you do your plus ten for the Sharpshooter?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 47 for Sharpshooter!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hunter's Mark?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 47, I didn't Hunter's Mark it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How do you want to do this? (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get it girl! Get it girl!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She was reaching out for that Dimension Door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see her hand reaching out, and you see her fingers tracing the incantation in the air as Sylas' hand reaches outstretched for hers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I point my finger down at her as I'm about to shoot the arrow. As it shoots, I keep pointing at her like: How's it feel, bitch? How's it feel?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As she reaches out, her eyes are locked with Sylas. She's not even paying attention to Grog at this point, all she's focused on is escape. And Grog as you look down at her and Sylas is looking into her face reaching out, the arrow just (impact) through the jaw and out the side of her cheek there. (breath catches) and her eyes go cold. The spell incantation fades and the hand just twitches and falls to the ground still.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was so dope!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As that happens, Sylas, his hand still reached out goes (yelling) "No!"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh I feel so bad for him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No you don't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I do have another attack!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns around to look at you, "Vengeance, I suppose, is mine this time."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And I attack him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This is a unique reversal of last time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With blazing bowstring.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sharpshooter. So 28 minus five hits?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28 minus five, yeah, that hits. That is the end of Delilah Briarwood.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like done?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Clones take a while.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 33 damage to him. Seven of which is fire damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gotcha. Is that the end of your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Were her hands her own hands?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They seemed to be.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to run down the stairs to the lower level. Yeah, I'm in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Two with one!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was going to feel really guilty about killing that thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You suffer 11 points of bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, you're up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to try and come around here if possible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With a speed of 30 you can do that, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Just here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Matt, don't forget those two guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They just got there last turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Delilah's dead!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy, what are you doing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: First thing I'm doing is I'm taking a grit shot at Sylas with Animus. And I'm doing a headshot just to make his life a little more complicated.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you get them at Reproductions, too?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I go to Prints Charming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you really?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is not a place.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a real place. It's on Ventura.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Percy! Roll your attack!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry! The most LA moment in our game ever! Just now!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't know about that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, no, maybe not. Yep, that'll do, that's a 26 to hit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That'll hit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And he has to make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, He's going to use legendary resistance to succeed.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: His first one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His first one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He still takes 16 points of damage and two points of psychic damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty, 18, got it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And I'm going to take another headshot, because that's funny. And that's 31 to hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 12 points of damage and one psychic damage. And does he make his constitution saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does actually, what's the DC on it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The DC is 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He rolled 20 exactly.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fine. I'm going to take another headshot. Burning my grit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pew pew!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's 34 to hit, Jesus Christ.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN

lines.text: We get back around everybody! Is he still fucking here?!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We get to Sylas' turn. Sylas dashes twice--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait, is it Sylas' turn or my turn?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sorry, it's your turn then Sylas', so go ahead.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My turn first. I'm going to take my advantage shot, because I have advantage because of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: With which gun?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With Bad News.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, why didn't I get to go?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh sorry, you're first. Go for it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I run out the door and hop on my broom and fly as far as I can--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no, no, no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Ring!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but I can only get 50 feet away from you guys. If I come here--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As soon as you go around that side, you're starting to get close. Up to you. You have Scanlan all the way over there. You barely have Scanlan in your--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I can't leave. So I'm at the bottom of the stairs. If I run up the stairs and broom it from here, how far would I get?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten feet out the window.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ten feet out the window and he's 150 and I'm-- my shot is what, but with Sharpshooter-- no, that's different.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Doesn't affect range, it just affects your chances.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit! Wait, let me look at Fenthras. I'm just hoping there's something that says it's 300 feet!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Fenthras does not change your range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (nervous laughter) Okay then, it's only 120-foot range, right? With a longbow?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, the way longbows work is you have an inner range and an outer range, so if he's beyond--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But if you're Sharpshooter the outer range is the inner range.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, your max is 600.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: My max is 600 fucking feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, yeah, so you just walk up and take a shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay then, I'm going to walk up to the window and I'm going to try to cast Bramble Shot on him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: With advantage!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With advantage?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's an attack.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Because of--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Guiding Bolt. Go for it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Much better!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Holy freaking half-elf!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Get him down!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my God. Okay, so 12, that's 18 plus 4d8.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sharpshooter doesn't double the distance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because your range is technically 30 to 60, but you can go the full 60 without taking disadvantage after 30 feet.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So it's at disadvantage normally?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No disadvantage as a Sharpshooter. It's a crazy feat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 43 points of damage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And he has to make a strength save of DC 17 or be restrained.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the arrow hits the bat, you watch as the arrow bursts into a sudden swarming of bramble vines. They wrap around him and the bat (small impact).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And does he take bludgeoning damage from hitting the ground?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does take a little bit. He's about 80 feet up from there, because he's going at an angle, so he takes 8d6 bludgeoning damage.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my God! That was the most sniper thing you've ever done!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was pretty awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, you watch as the bat form (poof) dissipates. The brambles fall weak and open.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I see him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No bueno.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I got 26 for Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a misty cloud in the space where Sylas was.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 34. Misty cloud! How did we fight him before? Sunlight destroyed him before?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Radiant something, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sunbeam destroyed him before.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: When he was in the gaseous form.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now he's in the gaseous form. Okay, so I rolled a 34.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I rolled huge. 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28? To what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perception.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you see the mist.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How far away is he?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's 150 feet away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He didn't get a chance to go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's 150 feet away from us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So as a group we can all try to move forward, but as we get closer to him--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You've got what it takes. What's the distance on that thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's the Daylight casting distance? Can you run forward and get close enough?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys aren't going to want to hear this, I can run forward and Sunburst him at 150 feet away but it's going to burn my 8th-level spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't do that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I have Sunbeam, which is a 6th-level spell at 60-foot away. No, I dropped my form.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What if you got on a mount?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just to get there as fast as you can.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: But we can't get outside of the 60-foot bubble.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can all move together and he will not be able to move at high speed as a mist.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hopefully.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I scoop up Vex and dash 60 feet ahead and Sunbeam him for another 60 feet?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dash as your action.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And we have to stay together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We have to stay together.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Well, you're in the gray. No. Where are you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm green.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm technically right here, right now. I'm on the second level. Next to Pike.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: And Bigby's is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it your turn Keyleth?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, whose turn is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's finishing Vex's.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, it's Percy's turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so Percy. Your turn.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Was that a Jenga?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Wait. I have a weird thing I'm going to try and do-- No, the thing I need to do, I need to get within 30 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you can get within 60 feet of me so just move toward--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So we're going to try to sync our movements.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. We'll say for the purposes of this, the mist travels and vanishes from sight by the time you are able to catch up to it to get it to a place where you can destroy it. Delilah Briarwood has been destroyed, seemingly for the last time. Sylas has been driven to wherever he needs to recover.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it take him a long time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vecna gives up.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Can I say one thing right now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: As we were moving in the bubble, I cast Animate Dead on Delilah and I raise her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're doing what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're fighting her again!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you look out, you can see the mist, and the mist vanishes, and you can see now, looking up, dozens and dozens of gloomstalkers have all turned to see this out-in-the-open action that's now taking place in the space around you. You are all out, not being stealthy, firing and shooting out into the air, and you see now, clusters of these things heading in your direction. As you turn and look to the side, you watch as Delilah's body gets up from the ground.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Rise, and kneel before your master!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the shambling corpse of Delilah falls to her knees before Arkhan--

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Oathbreaker, baby!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the realization begins of what is coming at you. Two you could handle, maybe. There's a lot in your direction. You have revealed your position, the wall was already destroyed and everything is swarming in your direction. As you all begin to turn around, you hear this deafening roar from the sky above you. You glance up to see a flash of brass light as Devo'ssa comes swooping into the barrier. Behind, a hundred or more Wyvern Riders, risen from Vasselheim to join the rest of the brigade come swarming in and collide with the gloomstalkers. You now see a frantic dog-fight cluster as hundreds of one and hundreds of the other begin slamming into each other, tearing each other apart. You see blades swing, you see arrows going flying and Devo'ssa begins to do sweeping rounds, back and forth across the sky. You realise if there is a moment to move with the distraction, it's now.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I load Delilah on the back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I grab her wand.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And her holy symbol that fell to the ground.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whatever that sparking thing was.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The glowing sparkle light in it is inert now.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is what? Inert?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was the controller. So we have it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We book it towards the tower. Right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Y'all, we recruited dead Delilah!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I want to find this dude!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What a dick!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to take a quick break, because we want to probably push to 11 tonight and then we're going to leave, so make a quick restroom break, fast as we can, come back. See you guys here in just a minute.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: At the break we're giving away--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're giving away things.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So many things!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Jocks Machina!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, actually, Max or Ryan, is there stipulations on the shirt?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll figure it out!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Hey Travis, go put this on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay guys, we'll see you here in a few minutes.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take the wrapper off! That's weird! [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Congratulations! You get to join the very exclusive Jocks Machina club.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Testosterone poncho.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Only five of these. The other's my trainer Ron, who plays another goliath, and my brother Nick, who plays an elf ranger who was incinerated by the fucking death knight!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The large front doors of the tower appear somewhat ajar and open. There is one rot behemoth currently standing in front of this door. Vox Machina, what do you want to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I don't want to overthink this, but I feel like the sword said that it wanted to cut the webs of Vecna. Can I just cut the tower down?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know if that's--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take your laugh as a sign of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know if you can cut the whole tower down. They'll probably try to stop you. Don't you think?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You could certainly try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I could, couldn't I?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Perhaps not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like, do we see any other doors, like, secret doors, maybe?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we see invisible doors?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perception, glancing around, you don't see anything. It looks like this is

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I do that without letting the rot behemoth see me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's a big fat no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can certainly try. It's not a no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: But we're directly in front of the door a ways back? How far back?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're about 40 feet away from it, off to the side, glancing over where you can see the rot behemoth looming in the archway.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We didn't really think about how we were getting up the tower, did we?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Here's a possibility. I have a gloomstalker and I have Delilah. I put her on the back of this thing and fly it up there, maybe this thing moves out of the way.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe the rot behemoth moves?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I'm just saying.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can she talk? Can you make her talk?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I don't think I can puppet her. I can tell her to do commands.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you tell her to talk?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: She'll understand what I'm saying, but I don't think she can--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance back and look at the corpse of Delilah behind you as a rapidly growing tree is protruding and growing out of the chest of the corpse, and is now setting weight off of the top of the gloomstalker as it's trying to flutter up behind the party.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sorry, sorry, that's a thing.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Can I Cleansing Touch and end one spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's less of a spell effect and more of a divine seed that was placed inside her body when she was slain by the Vestige, Fenthras.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I placed my seed inside of her.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And it quickened.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Don't make it weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I make everything weird, Matt.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I'm not going to further question you about that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You knocked her up.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Yeah, okay, must be an elf thing. That's interesting. Very interesting, okay, great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe they'll think that it's just a fashion thing, and they'll let her through.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's still growing, and it's now protruding about four feet from her chest. The body is now starting to get a little top-heavy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just chop the tree down! It's a thin tree.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's not very thick. It's maybe about-- Okay, so you take a couple hacks at it and eventually you manage to cut away the tree. Now there's a trunk that's now stopped growing, about a foot out of Delilah's chest, with roots that have taken root up into the shoulders and the chest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's sick. It's like she's got a built-in shield now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can I take one of the fancy robes that remains in the Bag of Holding and drape it over the trunk coming out of her chest, so it's a little more hidden?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now it looks like she's pregnant!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need a house. Can I take her branches and make one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A house?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (groaning)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh! What was that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you guys doing?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, our options are somehow flying up or going in the front door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we fly up, or do we go inside and up the tower? I'm sure there's no traps or horrible things on the inside of it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Last time, Pike and I took it down with a couple of Earthquake spells.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But that didn't help nearly as much as we thought it would.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, we didn't have to go up the damn thing, so maybe check yourself before you say things.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's just charge in. This is a fricking giant, right? We've killed giants.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Behemoth. Is it dead? Undead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rot behemoth? It's undead.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: It's undead? How big is a rot behemoth?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rot behemoth is about 12 feet tall or so. Just a mass of stitched-together undead flesh.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Medium, or large?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Large.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've got an idea. Can I borrow some of that infinite rope?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right. I'm taking the infinite rope, and I'm tying it around my little gem that I have.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The little blue gem?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My little glowing gem.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you going to do that $20 bill trick in New York City, thing?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: More or less. Are we all agreed?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love it, I love it!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If it doesn't work, we kill it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we'll drag it out of the doorway so we can kill it!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I'm going to make it move away, and then once we're in I'm going to yank--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I used to do this with string and a G.I. Joe for my cat when I was a kid. She loved it. I'm sure the rot behemoth will too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so. You take the pulse stone, you tie it around--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I tie it around in a monkey fist knot. I toss it about 20 feet away. I'm going to give it a throw. I'm going to throw it about 20 feet away from the-- We're all in agreement of this plan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is the best plan.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wait, one second. Do we want to lure it into a house and all of us be waiting to gank the shit out of it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, technically, wait, hold on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see a flash and a flare in the sky above you. You see a cluster of gloomstalkers immolated by a burst of flame breath from Devo'ssa, who's now up in the stratosphere. At this same time, you see about a dozen or so wyvern riders go riding into this slow, spinning storm and get disintegrated into pieces.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm actually going to throw the gem, then, past the stone giant, into the room. Just a little bit so that anything in the room--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a strength check for me. That's a bit of a lob.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. Nine?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It makes it about the 20 feet you intended to. (clattering)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pull it back and we'll have one of the-- I mean, not that you're not strong and very--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what was the range on this Pulse Stone?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 30 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, it is within range to affect the rot behemoth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay. I have to roll, though. I have to do a roll to see if it survived the throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah. It's fine.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tink, tink! It's a will save for the rot behemoth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: DC 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom? That's a two. No. You guys watch as the rot behemoth, the stone, (clattering), its metal-armored face and glowing coal eyes turn (heavy footsteps) and walks over to the gem and stares at it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's all go in, shall we? And I'm going to walk around it and stealth in.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pass Without a Trace is still fucking up, if it's been less than an hour.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a concentration check for me, real fast. Make a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We just watched the wyverns get obliterated trying to fly into the swirl at the top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I got 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Referring to the blast from the skeletal dragon, earlier on. All right. So. Did you guys all roll stealth?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Stealth? Oh shit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Plus ten!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, stealth?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I rolled a two and a two, so that's 15 and 15.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: How do I do this on this gloomstalker, with the zombie? How does this work?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gloomstalker, it's hard to be stealthed, that gloomstalker, right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're going inside, we don't need it anymore!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Want me to leave it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, what are you going to do with a flying thing in a narrow stairway? We've seen inside, we scryed inside. It's a very narrow stairway going up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you have him climb up the side of the tower and meet you up top?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh yeah, meet us up top? (under his breath) He ain't going to survive that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we can try it though.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He might.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Yeah, I think that would work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, you can do that.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I hate it when you do that!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, I love it, but I hate it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Also, double checking-- grit is a reset after combat, not a reset after a short rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, it's a short rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Short rest? Okay, just checking.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I have the wreath back on my neck, correct? Because that's how it works, I put it back on my neck once we're attuned?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you put it back on your neck once you've-- correct.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Okay. They, meet us at the top!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, as you step off and look into its eyes, your eyes flare the bright yellow color and the gloomstalker nods, takes a step back, and then leaps onto the side of the tower, its claws gripping in. As it bats its wings, it takes off and starts heading upward.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Circle at the top and wait for my command!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It seems to acknowledge your command.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: All right, now at disadvantage, rolling in heavy plate.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Do I have a plus ten? Sweet. Yeah, I got this. All right. Nine, 27.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so. 27. Two and two, 15, 15. Natural 20.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, it was a one, but it's a 37 now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Because you rolled a luck? What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, Matt told me that, because of reliable talent, one means shit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He always has a ten minimum.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's fucking badass! 37.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The normal greenish-blue glow of the shield is offset a little bit by the natural light that's coming through from the opening of the barrier that you guys have opened. However, the light still diminishes as you step into this large chamber. As soon as you enter the chamber, those of you with darkvision glance around and see, it's a big thoroughfare. You see a large foyer-type chamber with pillars that go from bottom to maybe 25, 30 feet up, to a ceiling. Across the way, you can see two spiral staircases that curl upward and there, maybe, 30 or so humanoid figures that are in the center of this chamber.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are they doing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, as soon as you guys step and turn around, they all turn and look at you and begin to-- (sluggish footsteps).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need that orb.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once they're within range of us, I'm going to wait.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, a lot of them are going to be right up on you, right now.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Can I sense what kind they are? Divine Sense, tell what type of fiend, celestial, or undead they are?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They are undead. They appear to be mostly of the baseline skeletal or zombie variety. It's a cluster of undead that are set here.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Okay, I'm going to tug on the rope and pull it up and toss the gem right smack-dab in the center of us. Unless somebody else wants to throw it. Eh, it doesn't matter. I just yanked it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: See if it's destroyed or not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nope, it's good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the various skeletons and zombies charge into the light. They stop and stare at it. Let's see.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: DC 15.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 30 rolls.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, can't you kill masses of undead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so of the 30 or so, about 20 of them stop and stare at the glow while you hear a bounding, heavy footfall sound behind where you came from.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He was not still within range?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you pulled the stone from where you were, inside the chamber now, so he's now rushing in after where the stone went.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This'll still work. Spread, and let him run right into the range of it?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we can get out of the way and let him maybe run into the undead that are--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: As soon as he enters he's in range, isn't he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly. Up to you guys. But technically, undead are still rushing in toward you and they're immediately scrambling, with their claws and teeth, out there. Let's say, for the people at front here, it's going to be probably the two of you who first made it in, so three attacks against each of you. That is an 18 against you, Vax.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That is a 20 against you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that misses. Three against you. Natural 20. A 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And a natural one. All right, so while they scramble at you and you push them back at bay, one of them does manage to get through. It's going to be 12 points of slashing damage against you, Vex, as one of them swings at you with a rusty blade that carves past you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. What are you guys doing?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How many of them? About 30?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 30 of them, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pickle, can you release a Sarenrae bomb?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't want to use any more spells.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have your Channel Divinity, your turn undead. Or destroy undead.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, destroy undead.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do I want to wait?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know how many undead we're going to face--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Vecna's going to be too powerful for a destroy or turn undead. It's for weak-ass shit like this.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But he might have, you know, I don't know what kind of army he's going to have up top, so it's up to you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, I have another one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So maybe do one of them?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So I can do it now, yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so as you rush in toward where this Pulse Stone is, as the crowd of undead are gathered in, you hunker down, clutch your holy symbol, and release a wave of divine energy, the whispers and prayer of Sarenrae emanating from you like a caustic wave against undead energy. What's the DC on that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's not written down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's your spell DC.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 18.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wisdom, intelligence, or charisma.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Wisdom for clerics.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Has your wisdom gone up at all?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Eight, plus five, plus your proficiency bonus. 14, 20.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not at--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I am? I didn't know that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So your DC is 19. Sorry, Matt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's okay. I lost count. Even with their saves, four undead survive. As the shock wave emanates out from you, you watch as about two dozen of these various skeletons and zombies, many of which are grasping at you, turn to ash. One of them, you see it reaching out toward you, you get a glimpse of it. You can see, this one's a fresher corpse, one of the zombies. It has dirty blonde hair, a torn chin with stubble, and for a brief minute you can see-- it has this gash in its stomach, a partially eaten arm. For a brief minute, as it reaches out for you before the wave hits, you're like, "Aldor?" Turns to ash.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Aldor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A member of the Slayer's Take. Once the prized love of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Felicia Day! (gasping)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, Aldor!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As the flash expands, you glance around and you see a withered gnome corpse has been reaching toward you. Mostly bald head in places. You recognize, this is one of your companions, Grubby, before the wave hits and he turns to ash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You just killed two of our friends, Pike!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't do that to her!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Fuck off, I didn't know!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All of these are long dead. As this burst of energy hits and all of a sudden dust and ash fill the chamber around you--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it do anything to the rot behemoth coming in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rot behemoth behind-- what is the DC on him?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Challenge rating of four or lower.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (crashing) What's the DC?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: DC is 15.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14, does not make it. By one!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't worry, Matt. Your luck is coming upstairs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's true, that's true. So the rot behemoth (crashing) through the door and then stays there, staring at the stone, blocking the doorway and holding it in place. But now this chamber's open.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we kill this shit while we're stunned?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we should just run up!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How do we know we're not going to run into a whole bunch more?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is why we're going to keep the rope. We're going to go all the way up the stairs, and when we're ready, we're going to tug like a motherfucker.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, and then all these things are going to chase after us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They'll keep following you. Every time you pull the stone, they're going to come toward you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So we might as well kill them now, while they're stunned.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, one at a time. Let's kill one at a time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The giant's going to take more than one hit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, but we're going to get him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say, easy enough for you guys to coordinate. The skeletons are easy enough to destroy. The rot behemoth, all in one swoop, you guys can take down as one quick blast on it. One of the skeletons, you also recognize: a heavily charred zombie making a horrid sighing sound as it's sitting there, staring at the stone. You see the remains of Vander.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Is he damaged?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Burnt to a cinder. The last thing you saw was him being immolated and screaming.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I'd like to Channel Divinity and Control Undead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. And with that, before you destroy the zombie--

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: It's a wisdom save.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wisdom save? Three. Nope. You've got two zombies. Delilah and now your previous ally, Vander. Turns from the stone. (wheezing)

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: This is fucking dark.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm really excited about the notion of a Delilah potted plant.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: It's my brother's character from our home group!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are now Michonne, from Walking Dead. You got two zombies.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Bring them into the CRU, you got them!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Zombie Vander, aw man. This is like, rattling whatever blackened heart my character has. Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All right, well, up we go, then, yeah?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's do this.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to look for traps, as we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, make an investigation check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Everyone all healed up to full?

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should we pause and heal, or--?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pause for 30 minutes and heal?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vasselheim was just out the window.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Two miles away, ish.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What'd you roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18, okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If you take a potion, you're full. Right? Don't you have your thing going, or no, is that gone?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Beacon of Hope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't automatically go to full health.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, I didn't know that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How long does Beacon of Hope last?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One minute.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Beacon is gone.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's okay. Do you have a healing spell for people?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we doing a group thing right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we short resting or we doing little healies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think we have 30 minutes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We need a full 30 minutes to do a quick short rest?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I let it slide a little faster in times of intensity. I'd allow a 30-minute quick rest, but that's still--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would not say no to it, but I can live without it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know, I mean, they're fighting at Vasselheim right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we're at the gates.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm at 94 hit points, I'm down about 50 or so hit points.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm telling you, though, it's this or nothing. If we fall here, if we fail, then it's fucked, so even if it destroys half the city, it's better to have all of us at full fighting potential.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: 4th-level spell slot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right, do it. Do the short rest. Just do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're doing a short rest? Wait, who needs it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We honestly all do.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We all need healing. I'm 40 points down.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm 50 points down, and I burned both of my shape change. Who else is down far?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A quarter, or half, of Vasselheim, is--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Don't you have a healing spell?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I do, but it depends on the roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No no, because it maximizes it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, we don't have it anymore.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, so if I roll bad, or--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, but we have hit dice. You don't need the spells.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Bye, Vasselheim.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you guys are taking a short rest in the inside of Entropis?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, look, super short.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is no super-short rest. It's a short rest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Seems terrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vasselheim was in sight when you were outside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know! What do you want?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm just letting you know!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We have potions! Can't we drink potions?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Listen, you're not going to need the potions after today. I'm just saying.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Might as well take them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't take your superior, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, we have other ones, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you try healing and see what it does?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'll do Mass Cure Wounds on you guys.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What does that do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know, but we also, we broke down the barrier, so Vasselheim can defend itself a little more.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: One-sixth of the pie.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm 50 points down and without my beast shape.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You don't have beast shape?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I used it to go earth elemental, because I thought the Briarwood fight might be a little bit more beefy than it was. But I don't necessarily need it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Vote as a group. Hand up if you want a short rest.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No hands? Just put your hand up if you want it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I will admit, it would do a lot for me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth, put your hand up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to put up because I think that these two need it.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll tie-break it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So short rest? Short rest. Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Vasselheim.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: To quote the leaders of Vasselheim, "They have defended themselves through many forms of battle."

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That vampire's going to be up there, full strength. He's going to be back. He's going to be back full strength.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He might not be back full strength yet!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: He'll be back something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He takes a while to rest up.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: It's 25 a minute, isn't it?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It's super fast.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He regenerates 25-- Well, there's a lot of things at work here. It depends. Roll a religion check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Natural one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll try a religion check.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Blind faith.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Seeing as how undead is your domain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Just roll a natural 20, Joe.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I rolled a natural 18.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Plus?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Zero, for religion.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, okay. You know this because of your experience with undead and amassing yourself a necromantic energy since breaking your oath long ago. When a vampire is reduced to zero hit points and goes into mist form, it has two hours to return to its resting place. When it reaches its resting place, it has to rest for one hour. Once it rests for the one hour, it goes back to one hit point and then it regenerates 25 hit points, or at least, Sylas, every single round.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roughly how much time has passed since we went from--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say 30-ish minutes or so. 30 or 40, because you've been slowly stealthing your way through, being careful.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right right, but probably his box of dirt is not--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you take a short rest, you're probably going to look at a Sylas waiting for you somewhere up top.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's going to take two hours to get up the tower?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a big tower. There's lots of shit up there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you take a short rest, you're going to have to deal with a Sylas.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I mean fuck it, if we heal ourselves--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan's got healing. Scanlan Two's got healing. We can pump you guys up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because he also turns people, right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He does turn people.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I barely made that save.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We need to not rest.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How much heal do you get out of a potion?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who's bad?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm not great.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You're bad? Who else?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I could use some, seeing that I have tank duties.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How many can you include?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, is anybody down? I'm going to do Prayer of Healing. I want to save Mass Cure Wounds.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm at 94 hit points, so I'm down--

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I'm down 42, but I could probably heal--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You could take a short rest, but understand and be prepared with the knowledge of knowing that you're also going-- put some things in your chamber that will be helpful against a vampire.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan Two has tons of healing spells that he can use, so use them. He's going to be dead soon anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You guys don't want us losing any of our spellcasters right now. I'm at 94. It's not a lot, it's not bad, but it's bad enough. I'm a third of my hit points down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do have a battery of low-level spell slots right now that can be used to heal things up if you want to.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I can heal you and heal you and heal you until you're all done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, but every time you heal me and heal me and heal me, it's taking away from something else mechanically.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a level one bullshit spell slot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But it's also healing that could be done in combat. That's what we're meaning.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm resigning my decision right now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a choice here, guys. You're wasting time in the tower.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No short rest! Heal some people, I'll heal some more. We got this. We got lots of healing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay, I'll just use a 2nd-level for 16 points of healing for six people who need it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Great!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 16 points? I'll take that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm taking one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will take it as well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How many people have taken it so far?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said up to six people? I'll take that.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 110, I'm still 31 hit points down.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will cast Healing Word, or Scanlan Two will cast Healing Word at 2nd-level for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. That's--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can use Cure Wounds as opposed to Healing Word.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't have Cure Wounds.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, that's right. Never mind.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's nine more points for you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: For me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Oh, wait! I can sing a Song of Rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That takes a short rest to do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. That makes sense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could do my speech if I had a short rest.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, you can do the speech as we climb up the tower!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: How much are you short? She's 22 short?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The speech does what? Does the speech regain hit points?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ten minutes to say the speech.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So as we climb the tower, she could be saying it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Perhaps, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I will heal you another 2nd-level healing spell.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A Greater Healing Potion is 4d4?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You've got it. 4d4 plus four.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's another 12 points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Consider now, as you guys climb the tower, if you have any buff spells, if you have any long-lasting things that you want to utilize for the coming fray. Freedom of Movement, Death Ward, all the things you guys want to prepare with, now's the time to do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 141, I'm full.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to, when we're right on the verge, when we think we're right on the verge, I'm blessing you and you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I think this is the verge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is this the verge? Because if this is the verge--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still have the tower to climb, but know, if you have spells, like buffs, to cast that aren't concentration and last a while, now's the time to do it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, an hour a while?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Tiamat gave her 12. I'm going to give 18 to myself out of my healing pool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Pike and I burn all of our 4th level spell splots to do--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Splots!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Splots! Do all of our spell splots! To cast Freedom of Movement on anybody. With the exception of Percy, who already has it.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: What does Freedom of Movement do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Wait, how many slots is that for you guys, then?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Three each.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Three each. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Except, we didn't account for--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan Two.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Or Arkhan.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: What's happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Anything else you want to buff with?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, I'm going to invoke my Blessing of the Dawnfather.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No Death Wards?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I did--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did Death Ward to yourself?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She has a Death Ward.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait a second. One of us is without Freedom of Movement.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan Two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have it automatically.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He has it automatically.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Understand.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can anybody cast some Death Wards too?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Wait, I didn't get Freedom of Movement?

lines.name: SAM, TALIESIN, MARISHA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We did it with an earring. Sorry, you weren't on.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I'm over kicking a can in the corner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're all on iPhones and you're on a Windows phone.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't have another 4th-level, unless I burn a 5th-level, for Death Ward.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Now, I have some funky shit. I have a Cleansing Touch, anyway, that can end a spell on me or any willing creature that I touch, so that should help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's the plan, guys?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, we're doing things that last an hour?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're doing things, yeah. We're doing it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shit.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, I don't know-- Unless we want to try and get higher up before we go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's up to you guys.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we think this is it? Are we sure this is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it one of these guys where we can see the height of the tower, or--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can't see the height of the tower. It goes up into another floor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because we've burned everything.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you want to hold your spells until you get higher, I'll let you do that. Up to you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's a death knight.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I don't know what's worth it. Do we have any idea of how much higher this tower goes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, it goes pretty high.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, excuse me. Where is Vecna right now? How high up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right above you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right above us, way up, or a floor up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Way up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Way up. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we want to try and jog another ten minutes before doing this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's get halfway up the tower.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, okay. Before we burn everything--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just letting you guys be prepared here, because you're Vox Machina.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, we're going to go ten more minutes up and I'm going to give a speech as we go.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So I'm invoking the blessing as we get closer.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does anybody else want Death Ward?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I'm good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I say, okay, guys, as we climb this tower, I know there's a lot of stairs, but the stairs are going to be fucking nothing compared to Vecna. But holy fuck, these are a lot of fucking stairs.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: This is inspiring.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The stairs are a metaphor.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The stairs are a metaphor. Each stair that we get across is going to be like another step further into defeating Vecna. You know? With each stair-- I'm winded.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The stairs are long, but they're not infinite.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sobbing and panting)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel so inspired, Keyleth. Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow, that was so inspiring.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is it, you guys! Just keep going up the stairs! And that's my speech.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, take your 17-- no, 19--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 19 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 19 temporary hit points. Including you.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: 19 temporary, yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And they're temporary, not--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: In addition to our plus two, so now we have 21.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do we heal above that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Well, you get temporary hit points, like a buffer shield.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right, so those 19 go first.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct. Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh god, oh god, oh god. Okay, are we getting near the top?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Let me know, because I'm going to throw up.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Who wants the Death Ward?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, and Pike and I cast whenever seems appropriate.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: But who wants it? Who needs it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, who's going to die?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This one, definitely.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, here's the thing. The people that have the trammels should probably have a Death Ward, too.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I've got my one hit point regenerate, regenerate, regenerate.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, you're good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike can have one.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have my armor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, so that bumps you back up once you've gone down once. So really, he needs-- and you, well, no. You won't come back right away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I have the Death Ward, I will pop back up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is only one person that can complete the Incantation of Sealing.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Sealing of what? Oh, the trammels?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once the trammels are in--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got to put it on Scanlan.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He has to do it. Without Scanlan, everything goes to shit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about Scanlan Two? Can Scanlan Two do it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Technically. He's not going to last that long, guys.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I cast Death Ward on Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike, I accept your blessing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Scanlan, if we get through this, you know what that means, don't you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, what does it mean?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It means that your clone's going to get very lucky. You, on the other hand, no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You'll just have to live. You wait and find out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, what does it mean? What could it mean?!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just live! You'll see!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just then, the real Scanlan comes back from peeing. He's like, what'd I miss, guys? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Ascending the stairs, you climb and climb, the spiral continuing upward. Both of the stairs spiral upward, so which direction did you take? The right, or the left?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The right. No, wait! Which hand does Vecna chop off?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The left.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does your speech do, Keyleth, again?

lines.name: MARISHA
