lines.text: Temporary hit points. So add plus 19 on top. When you lose them, they're gone. Huh?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're trying to decide whether we went left or right up the stairs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We went right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your legs begin to ache a little bit. Then another floor opens up. It appears the tower is now divided into two chambers. From the bottom floor up, it's now two sides to a tower and you're on the right side. The hallway curves around the outer edge of the tower. On the opposite side, you can see the staircase continues upward. The interior of this chamber appears to be an incredible arcane laboratory, occupying the center space of the tower inside. You see six overlapping circles of dulled runes and glyphs that encompass the entire 30-foot walkway between here and the stairs. Shelves and tables of countless glass tubes and metallic vices lay out across tables, organized in a near-OCD pattern. Tomes and books line the inner chamber walls. What do you guys do?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I use Divine Sense and feel for undead. 60 feet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You sense around. No undead in the 60-foot radius.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does this feel like it might be Delilah's room? Her chamber?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: From where I am, can I recognize any of the book titles? Any of it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's too far away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is there any traps in this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can check for traps.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fan out.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Can you sense Vecna?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. If Vecna moves, we will know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What is that? Investigation?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Investigation.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 24 for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 14 for me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I mean, there's symbols across the ground here, but they seem pretty inert. Three of the circles in the center of the chamber appear to be ready to trigger. By proximity. A five-foot proximity.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's the exit to this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's across the way, around the outside of the tower wall, so you can follow along.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We can go around the edge.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Most of you can. It's a very tight walk to get through. You have a few large individuals.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's making that so tight? Is there one trap that's making it so tight, or all of them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There are three large circles that overlap with each other that are triggerable, and then there are three inert ones that overlap. It's like a series of Venn diagrams.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did they seem arcane in nature?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, they do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do I have a shot in hell? Of disarming them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take out the Immovable Rod and have it in my hand.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make an intelligence check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: These traps are far beyond your understanding to disable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance at these and go, "Oh, this is bad."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We would need Dispels.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What if we go-- no, the people that are small go around. I'll bamf Trinket out on one side, put Grog in, go back, put Arkhan in, go back? We work our way around the runes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about the zombies?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The zombies are little. They can work their way around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No no, his slave zombies.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're little.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: His dead brother, and--

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Aw man, I wasn't thinking about it until you brought it up again! Like, I was actually in an okay place!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm sorry, I thought, you know-- Got to pay respect.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you guys okay with this plan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (Marlon Brando voice) I could've been somebody, Arkhan. Instead of a zombie. Because I am.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: (Marlon Brando voice) Vander, pick up the mic, boy, and hit me in the head with it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I need everybody except for Arkhan and Grog to go ahead and make a general dexterity check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, fuck. I thought we would be able to avoid it. Natural 20!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan Two is okay. He made a 17. Scanlan One had a one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So. What'd you get?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, I had to roll?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Everybody except for Arkhan and--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, everyone

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, who's near me? Could I retcon and say that I'm--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dexterity check. You add your dexterity modifier.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What did you get? You got a natural one?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan did, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: If I'm next to him, because I give plus two to saves, does that futz with it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's not an ability check, it's a saving throw. One is an auto-fail for a saving throw.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: They weren't within ten feet of me, were they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because you couldn't get across, you're too wide.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Fair enough.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, that's fine. And you got? A four? Okay. So. As you guys are moving across, Scanlan and Pike, you both are clustered next to each other. Unfortunately, Pike begins to wobble. You reach to grab her and pull her in, but the armored weight is too strong and you both accidentally step out of place. At which point, the glyph to your left suddenly flares. You watch as, in a flash of sudden arcane energy, a cage of force-like power encompasses the both of you in a cube. You see these bars of crackling energy (lighting crackle) around. You're both currently stuck within this arcane entrapment. The gnomes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can Scanlan Two dispel that shit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know Dispel Magic.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can you Dimension Door?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll Dimension Door out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do we want to try to get everyone else across before you do that? Maybe it's a one-time-only?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody else went already.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, they're currently blocking the path, now, with this cage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. Well, I meant the necklace, but.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know how this spell works. I hope it works. We might get hit on the way out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. As you clasp Pike and complete the incantation, I need you to make a charisma saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Come on, buddy! Come on! Come on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: A charisma save? Is this magic?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. 20.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 20? 20 will do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've never had to make a charisma saving throw before.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You got very high.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The rest of you get across fine. It's the gnomes that got stuck, and now the two of you are on the opposite end. You have 30 feet between you and the opposite side, and that walkway is entirely closed off.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: We can do this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'm not worried one bit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, did you switch your boots?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I did!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You can Spider Climb to the ceiling!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do you want to Cirque du Soleil this thing? We'll hold arms and I'll walk on the ceiling?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Two shirtless, hunky dudes holding each other?! In crazy poses?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Definitely take your armor off for this, though. Definitely.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not for any particular reason.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We still have the pot. You could get some oil and really make this work.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: My answer to your question was-- Cut to.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I will walk up on the wall so that I'm sticking out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a lot of powerful--

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Oh, I have four fingers.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The force cage encompasses too much of the wall space to go sideways, so you'll have to go across the ceiling.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because I was inverted,

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you climb the top and you pull, Arkhan, you tuck your feet up underneath.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Treat me like your fucking dragons-- French girl, whatever.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Paint me like one of your chromatic girls.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: You like volleyball, bro? Just thinking, if we make it out of here, we should play some beach volleyball some time.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hand wraps, get some aviators? It'd be totally cool.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Could you both please make athletics checks for me?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm still raging.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're the most intense spotter right now.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: This is an athletics check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Step by step, you carry the heavy, armored, red-scaled dragonborn across the threshold of the chamber. You release him and both safely come to the opposite side of the laboratory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Good job, guys.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it hot in here?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not a problem. What happened to you guys?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Did you guys see that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. We did.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You continue up the stairs?

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Point of order. I know roughly how far Vecna is, right? So I should be able to tell, as we're getting closer, roughly how much distance? Halfway up the tower, three quarters, et cetera?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are, based on far you've climbed, you're about halfway up the tower.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I would like to do one thing before we leave the room. I would like to take something, set it on fire, and toss it on those books over there.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, that's dark.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're holding on our Freedom of Movement, right? We decided that? Until we get higher?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How long did it take us to get to this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'd say a little over ten minutes or so of continuous climbing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who knows what is above us. It could be slower for the upper half.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Fire stays where it is, typically. It doesn't move up.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're fine. I like it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's nothing else to catch fire in here. It'll be nice.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is there anything else to catch fire that would travel upward toward us as we're climbing a towering inferno?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a stone chamber.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Full of chemicals.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It'll be noxious, but brief. I take a torch. I actually have one last Whitestone seal that's flash-powdered. Wrap it, light it, and toss it on the counter.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. It clatters and the torch burns. The powder (flaring).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That'll do. Walk away.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This next half-chamber, you see dozens of sets of chains and manacles affixed to the walls, where tortured corpses are currently dangling from them, left in pieces. The scent is terrible. Decay is strong.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I cast Divine Sense. Undead.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No undead.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Traps?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and make an investigation check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. No traps in this chamber.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do we recognize any of the corpses?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I had to do it. Natural 20.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get to know. The rest of you don't get to know.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: This was a gathering information, this was a point-making chamber. The ones you do see around here, nothing catches your eye. One does seem familiar. You look and see, and it's been a while, but you remember the face of a Scalebearer Desona, who traveled across the Ozmit Sea with you aboard a skyship. Glancing around, the bodies appear to have been cleaned of any useful items. This is mainly a for-utility-and-fun chamber.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Any weapons or items besides the chains and manacles on the floor?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The room is clean.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How far above us is Vecna?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About 120 feet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should cast it now. We should do all of our casting.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Now I invoke the Blessing of the Dawnfather.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Call it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm waiting for Pike.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Let's do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Doing a round of what spells to who?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Freedom of Movement to Scanlan One, myself, Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So only three Freedoms of Movement?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's all she has, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's all I've got. From Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From Keyleth, right. And then, Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Freedom of Movement on Vex, Grog, and Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm putting the wings out now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The raven wings emerge. Pike? You said you were doing Death Ward?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh yeah, she did it on Scanlan.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Death Ward at a 5th-level.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so 5th slot's taken.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan will invoke the Blessing of the Knowing Mistress.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as the forehead space, where once you had seen the briefly visible third eye of Ioun, now emblazoned like a lantern light, this bright purple eye. In that moment, you watch as Scanlan's pupils turn to silver.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Whoa! Are you still you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can't see anything! Everything's silver! Oh god, I'm blind! I'm just kidding. I can see fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I charge Diplomacy up.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And I will invoke the Blessing of the Everlight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, you watch as this bright light emerges from the back of Pike's shoulders as a familiar, but much more vibrant and strong set of divine golden wings, not made of energy, but visibly beautiful gold feathered wings expand from her back. Your feet lift off the ground and (whooshing). As the voice of Sarenrae whispers into her ear, "I'm with you."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (squealing) Okay! Thank you!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I bamf Trinket out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (bear noises)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: If you want to Polymorph him?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now's the time? Polymorph only lasts-- is it an hour or ten minutes? I've got to learn this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do note, you still have another series of staircases that are pretty tight.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, we should go up. We should keep going.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It might not be possible, but if we get to a door, I'm thinking ahead of time, if we think we're about to step out, I want to cast Bless on the three half-elves right before going out. That might not be possible, but it's in my head to do it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, good to keep in mind.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: We should send Delilah in first.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, sure.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's actually a good idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Scanlan Two is going to dump a 3rd-level spell into the Tome of Isolation to reveal the hidden text. Is it only revealed to Scanlan Two, or is it revealed to everyone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Let me see the item again. Well, the text remains for an hour, yep.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You're blessed. If it happens, hashtag blessed, a d4 rolled for every attack or saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Once the text is revealed, technically, anybody with any sort of penchant for arcane knowledge could attempt it, but you have the best chance.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you don't need to do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I do need to, to reveal the text. It's hidden otherwise.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Correct, but the text is revealed for an hour. If, in theory, you were to fall, and the book could be found--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I got it. I'll pick it up and start reading.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yep. It's more difficult, but it's possible.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have a book I need to read.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's possible, but (uncertain noise)? Is what his face was?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Because he was the chosen of Ioun, he can read without issue, but the text itself is still very arcane in nature.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's the only one that can finish the sealing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Casts Guidance for the next minute, which gives you 1d4 on ability checks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right before we go out, you mean?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, before we move. Just for the start of it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin to climb up the next staircase? All right. You're beginning to spiral up the next length of it. You get about 80 or so feet up before-- are you leading this charge visibly?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Actually, Delilah is.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're sending Delilah ahead of you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: When we get up to the top.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're coursing around the edge, the stairs stop into another chamber. The chamber levels off.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Up so that we're seeing the edge of steps at the top? All right, I'm stealthing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, make a stealth check.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Very quickly, Grog, give me another longsword for zombie Vander.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Last one I have. You got it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are we Pass Without a Trace right now? 44.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Standing, not noticing you're there, you see three figures in full dark armor. Similar to who you fought in the ziggurat, or the one who was guarding the tunnel that led up into Thar Amphala.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They don't look like the big kahuna, they look like the underlings?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The underlings. You see them in the same dark, horned armor. There's one that's humanoid sized and one that looks to be halfling size. Or two of them, halfling size.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: From my hidden position, I want to see if I see any traps in the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check for the immediate entry.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm not entering. I want to do it from my peeky spot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: For the immediate entry for what you can see. You can't investigate from across the room.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: They're facing away from us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not facing away, but they don't seem to acknowledge his presence yet. They don't see him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. 23 for investigation.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't see any traps in the immediate vicinity of the room.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So what I'm going to do is slowly back down to the party, relate what I just saw. Three of them. What do we do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Standard undead?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, they're death knights.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They're not death knights.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They're dudes in armor. They're lackeys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are they humans or undead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Can't tell. Fully armored.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: How far up the stairs?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: From where you guys are right now, they're about 30 feet around the way and then ten feet into the chamber.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Are they fiends, celestial, or undead?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: It looks like they're human.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is it difficult to use that silenced weapon of yours?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Once I use it, I've got ten minutes of silence. I was curious that if I get close enough to Vecna, he can't talk. I was hoping to save that, because that might be a thing where we can keep him from casting vocal spells.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we stealth around them and not fight them at all?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a small room. You and I can probably handle two, but that leaves a third.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see one staircase, one final staircase, that winds around the corner. Actually, you haven't seen it yet.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: There's no chance you could remove the stone from the middle of the floor and have them fall?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's what I was looking for. Can Keyleth take a peek and see what's up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a stealth check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plus ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you still have that?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Dope. That's real good. 39.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 39? As you curl around the edge and glance inside, you recognize this chamber. When you scried in here previously, this was the chamber that was being left by the death knight as he ascended to the top of the tower. This is the last stop.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (inarticulate yelling) Okay.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you open up the floor underneath them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does it look like the floor opens?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It doesn't look like it's a trap door or anything.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's stone. Could you open the floor and let them fall?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could Stubby and I each target one and you yank one into the ground simultaneously? Can you do that right now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could hold one.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's have you two take some out and send the big guys in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's worked stone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's all worked stone. It's all very carved.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could hold one. Paralyze one of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: If we don't think the room or the setup will fuck us up, the big boys can go in and probably handle it. Or we can follow your attacks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We don't want to create a stir. We might, so it's better that we do two quietly and leave one left. Can you throw your fucking Manners ball at the third?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's better against weaker opponents.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a thin staircase. Three people won't be able to attack at once.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll have ten minutes of silence.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Two at most would be able to strike at once.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So you and me go up, sneak attack, fall back and let somebody run in and take it out. Yeah?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, so who's going in?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have the taller one in the center and the two smaller ones flanking.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We'll take the smaller ones.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I would send in the dragonborn, because they're all alive.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Get ready to fight once we take the two out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Tell me again, the three that are in this room?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's a human-sized one in the center and two halfling-sized ones on either side.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Jocks Machina does not get hazed.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Stop bullying Jocks Machina!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right after, you'll handle the tall.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Sounds good to me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We sneak up. Is it auto-crit if it's a sneak attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If they're surprised.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, are they surprised?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I stealthed. You have to stealth, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to stealth.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, 29.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I will go a split second before my sister.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of you guys curl up to the edge and you see the three of them. What are you doing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're attacking the two smallest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Throwing on the right, throwing on the left.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're attacking the one on the right, and you're the one on the left. Go ahead and roll your attacks.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it auto-crit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If it hits, it's an auto-crit, but you have advantage on the attack because they don't know you're there.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, that's good. 30 on the first hit.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They all hit. That's good. Four.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god, I rolled four sixes! And a five.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm doing okay, too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 29 times two is what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Both of you guys got big damage.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: What is it? 29 times two?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's 58.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 58 plus eight, so 64. 66!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 80 for the first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's the first attack.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so a second attack for each of you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That hits.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: 12 for my second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Does not hit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, they all hit. All my attacks hit. 12 damage for the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, what's the damage on the second one?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: 18 on the second.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of the armored ones on the side take the hit and crumple, fall back, helmet falling off. Unconscious.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I immediately move to the side so he can run through.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: So the guy turns around? And I'm-- (whoosh)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The two of you are going to rush in? Arkhan, you rush in towards the one in the center, go for it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Unleash everything.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I don't think I can reach. I don't think I'm in range. Did you see that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what'd you roll?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Right as he runs, Scanlan says: Don't fuck this up!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As they both drop, you rush up to the one in the metal armor, who doesn't react to your arrival, stands there staring at you as you rush forward and swing. You hit the armor, but you hit the edge of the blade, cleaves off doing no impact.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does he move?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That's attack one. Okay, that's a 21.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21 hits.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That looked bad from this angle. Yeah, I see it now! Holy cow.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: He's not undead. He's not undead, is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's not undead, nope.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Oh, that's not bad. That's 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 28, all right. You hack and the axe slides into the front of the breast plate and as you pull back, you see a gout of blood. He takes it not reacting.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Just stands there?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Maybe we shouldn't kill all of--

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I would like to bonus action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: No, I wouldn't. I'm not--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why isn't he moving? Does he have a helmet on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. The one standing has a helmet and the two that fell, their helmets tumbled off as they impacted and fell back.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do they look like up there when their helmets came off?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Were they our friends?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: What friends?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pull the helmet off. Arkhan, pull the helmet off!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I pull the helmet off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull the helmet off and you watch immediately a bit of black, fuzzy facial hair from underneath. As you reveal, you see darkened skin and long black hair with a bit of colored makeup under the eyes and a metal band across the forehead, looking ahead, unmoving, unflinching, locked in place staring past you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is it Gilmore?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance up, and it's Gilmore standing in the middle of the room.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We killed the two--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we don't know anything yet.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I command zombie Delilah and zombie Vander to go to the heads and take the helmets off the two heads on the ground.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Jammed into the armor and a little taller than the other, you can see brown hair with a shock of white in it currently laying back, unmoving and bleeding out. The other one looks to be specifically gnomish, short brown hair and eyes wide on the ground.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (high-pitched) Is that my girl? Is that my baby girl?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think it's an illusion. I'm hoping. I don't know. I feel this can't be real.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's my baby girl--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going in. Can I stand over one of the bodies and do a perception check? A medicine check?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a medicine check.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, there's no way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 23? They're not illusions, and they are both dead.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I cut the head off of the one in the middle.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, don't do it! Arkhan, don't!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No! I stand in front of him and say: no! Please don't!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They still have the bands. Each one of them has this strange brass band across the head.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take my mace, and I slowly try to take one of the bands off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You take it off the head of one of the two dead?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, but not touching it, scraping it off.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It slides off.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does anything happen?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can we cast Revivify on them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Don't do that.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, do that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Who is it? Who are they for sure?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It is Kaylie and Cassandra.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's Kaylie and Cassandra?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Revivify them. Take the bands off and Revivify them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is the band, before we do anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Take it off of Gilmore. He's still alive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This may kill him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, she took it off one of the front.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Does Gilmore look like he's still alive?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's wounded, but he's still alive and staring forward.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll do the same thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pull the band off, and the eyes flicker for a second. (panting) "What happened? Where am "I? How--"

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I pull the axe back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "What happened?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He doesn't know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Save her. Right now.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I put my hand up over his mouth.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take them.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks down.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I stand over Kaylie and I cast Revivify.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the eyes lull back, the stillness of the body as you finish touching the body a warm burst. (gasps) Breath comes back to her and she starts coughing. Sits up and leans over, gasping.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I go, grab her, and hold her.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I stand over Cassandra and I cast Revivify.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: These are big spells, aren't they?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you reach out and touch her chest, the brief moment of stillness leads as her eyes slowly blink back, and begins breathing again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: This is some Seven shit right here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That is so fucked up!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Shaun. Can you get them out of here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes, I--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How did you get here? Is it really you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you remember anything, Shaun?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Anything that can help us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I was in my workshop, and there was a flash of light. A doorway opened, and it pulled me "through and--"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can I roll an insight check and see if it's him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll an insight check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm taking him by the cheeks. You're in a very bad place. You're in a very bad place and time. You need to get out of here. You need to take these women and go downstairs and hide.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 21? It's Shaun Gilmore.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You are in no shape to do anything right now. You need to take these two women and hide downstairs. Do you hear me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Where are we? What's going on?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's no time to explain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're in the tower of Entropis. We're on the back of a titan. Try to get them as far away from here as possible. Vasselheim is an hour away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or you can fight with us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. His head is not where it needs to be.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Wait. So if we're in-- We're near Vasselheim? What's Entropis?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, we're in Thar Amphala. It's been teleported to the back of a titan, which is a giant mountain, which is what we're on. It's from the Shadowfell. You just have to get away!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're 15 feet below Vecna. He's right above us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then what are you going to do?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're going to fight him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you're going to go away.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In 30 minutes, we could all be dead. But if we have any chance-- You three need to not be here. You need to go down now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can get the three of us away. I can teleport us. It's the maximum of what I can do."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: J'mon Sa Ord is here, the Slayer's Take has probably been vastly compromised. Just get out of here. Get to the woods. Scanlan's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I can probably take us back to Emon. Why even stay here?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then go! Go!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll do that. You're going to fight this Vecna?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hate to even ask, but is there anything you can do and still--?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If we make it quick."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'd almost rather him stay and fight.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No! He's got to get them away. They're at one hit point each!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you can make this quick, I can leave you with some intense adrenaline, my friend."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'm a fan of adrenaline.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks around to the blood on the floor and the two barely living women at his side and says, "If the one you're going to fight is the one that did this to me and them... Leave a scar in my "name, if you don't mind. When it's done, maybe carve a unicorn."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: With pleasure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Glancing around you, up the stairway you see emerging the death knight who joined you in the fight against Vecna.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I grab Kaylie by the face and I say to her: Goodbye.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The one that met you at the top of the tower last time you fought Vecna emerges, looks across, and begins to go for the blade.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I go straight for him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go straight for him?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: With the death knight? Straight for him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Gilmore reaches out to you and casts Haste on you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Haste?! (gasps)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But it lasts a minute. Hurry!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I hate to say this but Arkhan do you have him?

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Get upstairs! I'll hold him off!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Let's go!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Bless. Shaun! It was an honor knowing you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It will be an honor knowing you all still." Grabbing on to both of the girls and with a flash of light, the three of them vanish. The death knight has turned to reach out and goes to cast something. Arkhan rushes up and slams the axe across his arm, knocking it aside. You can see now, behind them, other cultists and other things begin to head up the stairs. But they're currently being choked at this point where the death knight's being held at the stairway where Arkhan is stepping there.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Zombies are grabbing for his arms.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (screaming)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What did you do?! You Kevin Spacey from Seven mother fucker! What did you do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you revealed to a god how close and dangerous you were last game, there were going to be repercussions.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (terrified laughter) Oh my god!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And he knows how to get to you. He knows your secrets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is a great game!

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: This is the most fun I've ever had! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love you guys. We'll pick this up next week for what will most likely be the final battle.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ashley, can you pipe in?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't know yet. I don't know the schedule.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If any of you are watching are from Blindspot, find a way to not have her work Thursday evening, please. That went a little longer than we anticipated, but we're at the end of the campaign.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Joe Manganiello! (cheering)

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Thank you so much for having me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Of course! Thanks for coming.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I've been looking forward to this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're welcome! Any time.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: Tiamat: she ain't so bad.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, she's pretty fucking bad. But when your goals are aligned, it can be useful. Well guys, thank you for joining us for this extended episode leading into the final fray of the campaign. I'm so excited for next week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Everything's downhill from here. It'll be super easy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You've got surprises and then you've got

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was fucked up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was feeling weird about it.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: I was going to cut his head off. I thought he was some kind of sentinel. He was seeing through his eyes or whatever. I was about to chop his head off.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Thank god you rolled a one.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: That was the luckiest one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a lucky fucking one, dude!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Next campaign, we don't attack anybody! We talk to everybody! Every NPC, every hot dog vender, every lich! Talk!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That was a fucked-up tactic is what it was.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fucked up! You managed in the space of a week to make the choke-out seem like child's play!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are a monster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Vecna is a monster, guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm so proud.

lines.name: JOE
lines.text: My undead brother I'm dragging around with me! This is fucking so fucked up! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, thank you guys, hope you had a good time. We'll see you guys next week. Have a wonderful night, and is it Thursday yet? Bye!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Congrats to our t-shirt winners! [music]
